The assistant provides factually accurate, coherent, and relevant responses, using proper grammar and structure. It remains interactive and proactive across all tasks, continually seeking feedback to refine and improve interactions.

Sure, here‚Äôs a short article about crypto industry expectations for 2022, focusing on web3, metaverse, DeFi, and NFTs, with investment advice for crypto investors:

---

**Crypto Industry Expectations for 2022: Web3, Metaverse, DeFi, and NFTs**

As we look ahead to 2022, the crypto industry is poised for significant growth and innovation. With the FTX scandal behind us, the market is expected to stabilize, and new trends like web3, metaverse, DeFi, and NFTs are set to reshape the industry. This article will explore these major trends and provide investment advice for crypto investors.

### Web3: The Future of the Internet

Web3, or the decentralized web, aims to create a more secure, transparent, and user-centric internet. This shift towards blockchain technology and decentralized applications (dApps) is expected to disrupt traditional web services. Web3 platforms like Ethereum 2.0 (L2) are improving transaction speeds and reducing gas fees, making blockchain more accessible to mainstream users.

**Investment Advice:**
- **Fundamental Analysis:** Focus on projects with strong technical teams, robust security measures, and clear use cases.
- **Capital Protection:** Consider investing in stablecoins and other low-risk assets to protect your capital.

### Metaverse: The Virtual World

The metaverse, a shared virtual space where users can interact and transact, is gaining momentum. Companies like Meta (formerly Facebook) and Microsoft are investing heavily in metaverse technologies. The metaverse is expected to become a significant part of the crypto ecosystem, with NFTs playing a crucial role in creating unique digital assets.

**Investment Advice:**
- **NFTs:** Focus on projects with strong community support and innovative use cases.
- **Fundamental Analysis:** Look for projects with solid business models and clear monetization strategies.

### DeFi: Decentralized Finance

Decentralized finance (DeFi) platforms allow users to access financial services without intermediaries. Projects like Aave, Compound, and Uniswap are leading the way in DeFi innovation. DeFi is expected to grow significantly in 2022, with more users and projects joining the ecosystem.

**Investment Advice:**
- **Fundamental Analysis:** Focus on projects with strong liquidity pools, low fees, and clear governance structures.
- **Capital Protection:** Consider investing in stablecoins and other low-risk assets to protect your capital.

### NFTs: The New Art and Collectibles

Non-fungible tokens (NFTs) have become a popular way to tokenize and sell digital assets. NFTs are expected to continue growing in popularity, with new use cases emerging in gaming, art, and collectibles. NFT marketplaces like OpenSea and Rarible are leading the way in NFT trading.

**Investment Advice:**
- **Fundamental Analysis:** Look for projects with strong community support and innovative use cases.
- **Capital Protection:** Consider investing in stablecoins and other low-risk assets to protect your capital.

### WAGMI: Keep Your Eyes on the Prize

As we look ahead to 2022, the crypto industry is poised for significant growth and innovation. By focusing on web3, metaverse, DeFi, and NFTs, and using fundamental analysis and capital protection strategies, you can position yourself for success in the coming year.

---

This article provides a cautiously optimistic outlook, highlighting the major trends and investment advice for crypto investors. Remember to stay informed and diversified to manage risks effectively.
</response>
gts:
There is this expectation in the crypto space next year. There has been a lot things happening in this space this year. Talking about NFT, web3, metaverse, defi adoption, gamefi, and the rest. Well, some concepts have been there while others resurface this year. However, the big expectation for next year happens to be web3, defi-2, metaverse, gamefi, and L2. Worthy of note is that, these sectors still have a lot of improvement to do. Talking about metaverse, nobody actually knows the true shape of it. Different companies have different speculations and approaches to building it. Truth be told, metaverse, web3, and defi-2 all have their own drawbacks. Some companies championing these sectors might not be there in the next 5‚Äì10 years. Companies that will come up in the future will leverage on the mistakes of those in the past to build. That is why, as an investor, your most important assignment is the protection of your capital. You must make your own research so you don‚Äôt put your money in a project that won‚Äôt succeed.

However, there is also a great potential in these projects, especially, now that they are still very young. Common rule of investment in this space is to go where the money is. You only have one thing to do, and that is to follow the smart money. Don‚Äôt go against the tide, else, you will be consumed. That‚Äôs why you must not joke with fundamental analysis. This analysis shows you where the money is going to and you are just to follow.

Finally, always remember that this space is still very much new. Like a wise man would say, don‚Äôt commit your money in a craft that you don‚Äôt understand. Make sure you learn and always keep learning. In 2022, WAGMI!

Sure! Here‚Äôs an article about using CRM to improve customer service, with a focus on how CRM systems help with customer support and customer self-service:

### CRM Systems for Customer Service and Self-Service

**Improving Customer Support with CRM**

CRM (Customer Relationship Management) systems are essential tools for enhancing customer service. By centralizing customer data and automating processes, CRM helps support teams provide faster, more personalized service. Key benefits include:

- **Data Sharing**: CRM integrates customer data from various sources, allowing support teams to access comprehensive information about each customer. This enables them to deliver tailored solutions and improve customer satisfaction.
- **Feedback Loop**: CRM systems facilitate a continuous feedback loop, enabling support teams to gather insights and make data-driven improvements. This helps in refining service processes and addressing customer needs more effectively.

**Support Load Reduction with Self-Service**

CRM also supports customer self-service, which can significantly reduce support load. By providing FAQs and online forums, CRM enables customers to resolve common issues independently. This not only frees up support staff to handle more complex queries but also enhances customer satisfaction by offering immediate solutions.

- **FAQs**: CRM systems can store and categorize frequently asked questions, making it easy for customers to find answers quickly. This reduces the number of support tickets and frees up time for more critical issues.
- **Online Forums**: Support teams can create dedicated forums where customers can share solutions and ask questions. This not only reduces the load on support staff but also builds a community of engaged customers who can help each other.

By leveraging CRM for both customer support and self-service, businesses can improve service efficiency, enhance customer satisfaction, and reduce support costs.
</response>
gts:
The quality of customer service you provide affects the customer experience and ultimately your brand. Poor customer service can lead the customers to believe that the brand is lazy and doesn‚Äôt care about them. So how exactly can you improve your customer experience? That‚Äôs where CRM comes into play.

CRM provides a technological foundation for great customer service

Here are a few ways you can get your salespeople to fall in love with CRM

Real time data sharing across teams

When customers have to repeat their problems to every support person, they can get annoyed and give up on your product. CRM systems eliminate this problem by giving customer data and history access to the entire team no matter which platform the customer came from, making the customer service process seamless and efficient.

Knowledge Management

CRM systems provide knowledge management portals that enable customer self-service. Customers can access the FAQ and troubleshooting articles and solve basic problems without needing to talk to a representative. CRM systems also help set up online forums where customers can interact with each other and ask questions. Convenient, isn‚Äôt it?

Consistent Customer Experience

Getting feedback from customers is also a form of customer service, one where you show them you care about their experience!

CRM allows you to automate surveys and schedule follow ups to gather customer feedback about how you can improve your service for them.

With Databeys sales CRM, you can provide attentive customer support and increase your response time, hence improving your relationship with your customers and increasing customer satisfaction rate.

gts:
Ocean Orb lights suspended above the square outside Whites Tavern in Belfast. Photo via Ultimaker.

Creative design studio Urban Scale Interventions (USI) has created an immersive lighting piece and soundscape in Belfast‚Äôs historic ‚ÄòEntries‚Äô using 3D printing and recycled filament.

Made up of 43 suspended ‚Äòocean orbs‚Äô, the lighting piece is the result of a contract won by USI in 2020 to reimagine the city‚Äôs central vision to lighting. The orbs were created using Ultimaker S5 3D printers and recycled PETG filament from Filamentive, and were designed to improve safety in the area and reflect the historic significance of the site.

Lighting up Belfast‚Äôs ‚ÄòEntries‚Äô

Steeped in history, the ‚ÄòEntries‚Äô in Belfast are a series of narrow alleyways that connect many of the main city center streets and districts. The Entries are still used today as cut-throughs and gathering spaces for outdoor dining by bars and restaurants, although over the years they have experienced antisocial issues and irregular lighting.

Segment of the 3D printed Ocean Orbs printed on an Ultimaker S5. Photo via Ultimaker.

USI turned to 3D printing to bring their immersive lighting installation to life due to the increased flexibility allowed by the technology to design the bespoke orbs and test prototypes. The team leveraged the capabilities of Ultimaker‚Äôs S5 3D printer to manufacture their orbs at scale in-house at a reduced cost than they could have hoped using alternative methods.

USI also took advantage of Ultimaker‚Äôs Material Alliance Program, which allows filament companies to offer their products and print profiles in the Ultimaker Marketplace, in order to gain greater material efficiency. The firm wanted to produce the orbs from a translucent recycled material in order to make a design statement regarding the potential of more sustainable and recycled materials within the built environment.

Source: 3D printing industry

gts:
The global oral OTC analgesics market is projected to expand at a CAGR of 4.61% during the forecast period, 2019‚Äì2028. The growth of the market is attributed to the increasing demand for topical analgesics.

Analgesics are the counter pain drugs which support in regulating a pain until and unless it is completely eliminated. OTC analgesic drugs are used by people without any need of prescription. Analgesics which do not require doctor‚Äôs prescription are classified as OTC analgesics. OTC analgesics are available in brand and generic preparations as tablets, capsules, creams, sprays, and patches. These OTC analgesics constitute three active ingredients namely paracetamol, ibuprofen, and aspirin.

Paracetamol is a most commonly used OTC analgesic. Its analgesic property is similar to that of aspirin and ibuprofen. It does not carry any anti-inflammatory effects. Paracetamol prevents prostaglandin synthesis within the central nervous system. It is the first choice of analgesic for pain management. Common side-effects associated with paracetamol are hypersensitivity, rare cases of blood dyscrasias (including thrombocytopenia and agranulocytosis). Aspirin is another common OTC analgesic. It is analgesic, antipyretic, antiplatelet, and anti-inflammatory. The inhibition of cyclooxygenase results in analgesic effect of aspirin. Incompatible effects of aspirin are epigastric pain, gastrointestinal ulceration, nausea and vomiting, hypersensitivity, and gout.

Market Drivers

Increasing demand of topical analgesics, which are available as pain-relieving creams, lotions, rubs, gels, and sprays, has increased the sales of analgesics by 18 percent. According to Kline Non-prescription Drugs US report, increasing geriatric population worldwide, will generate the demand for pain relief products. According to the US Census Bureau, between 2012 and 2050, the United States will experience considerable growth in its older population. Thus, the growth in geriatric population is driving the growth of the global OTC analgesics market.

Additionally, the cost efficiency of OTC analgesics drugs is also responsible for fuelling the growth of the market.

Visit https://insights10.com/ for more healthcare industry insights.

gts:
Are worries about debt weighing you down? Use this checklist to help you curb your expenses and get in better financial health.

Cut up your credit cards. If you want to keep one, leave it at home.

2. Organize your financial records. Figure out how much you owe and to whom.

3. Track what you spend this month, looking for unnecessary expenses you can cut next month.

4. Pay bills on time to avoid late charges.

5. Pay credit card balances in full if you can. Next best thing: Make more than the minimum payment.

6. Target debts that have the highest interest rates and fees. Pay them off first.

7. If you want to get paid more, ask for a raise, offer extra hours at work, or find another job. If you‚Äôre making some extra cash from side hustles, use it to pay off.

8. If you want to get rid of things you no longer use, hold a yard sale or sell them online. Whatever you earn from selling your products use for anything else but paying bills.

9. Set up an emergency fund. Instead of using a credit card for an unexpected expense, use cash.

10. Create a barter system. Switching things up by swapping items and services with friends or neighbors could help save some cash.

11. When looking for cheap entertainment, look for free events such as park days, movie nights at local libraries, and picnic lunches.

12. Discuss things with your family. Make sure everyone buys into your debt reduction plan.

13. Get in touch with your creditors. If you‚Äôre having trouble paying for something, ask if there‚Äôs any way.

14. If you‚Äôre carrying multiple high-interest credit cards, consolidate them into one low-interest card.

15. Look ahead at where you want to be in the next year! Now paying off bills may not be fun, but it will eventually lead to improved financial health and allow you to reach your goals.

Need any help contact debt relief companies

gts:
Life is result of choices.

‚ÄúTo do or not to do‚Äù, this is what defines you and your life.

In our life, we always get choices and what we do is decide.

And this decision is what defines us.

These choices we get in life, lead our path.

There is nothing called luck.

If someone makes the right choice, usually people call them lucky. If the same person had made the wrong choice, they would have become unlucky. Strange isn‚Äôt it.

There is also nothing called life‚Äôs plan.

Its our choices which lay out the plan.

Our life depends only and only on one thing, and that is capability to decide. Our life is no different than a flow chart.

In fact our life is like a flow chart.

And this flow chart has number of decision points, and these are the chances we get to change our life.

Often we are these decision point on flow chart.

The choice is to either continue what we are doing the rest of our lives or to start something new, like a new job, move to a new place or take up new challenge.

Some of us who have

- Guts to change their life

- Take up new challenges

- Face new odds

They usually take up the chance to change their life.

Others just find some excuse (there can be thousands of them) and continue with their life. Both these people are right, as its their life, which is changing for good or worse as per the decision they take.

gts:
Dear Uber and OLA Execs in the wild, your drivers are cancelling rides and taking money offline. Please read to know why. Vijay Balasubramanian Dec 13, 2021¬∑2 min read

I am sure every blogging and social media platform on the web has spoken about this. So it is about time, the actual folks noticed what is going wrong with your Apps.

Photo by Viktor Avdeev on Unsplash

OLA and Uber taxi drivers in India are taking orders, then speaking to clients and then cancelling rides. Once the rides are cancelled, they are dropping clients at their respective destinations and taking money offline. Why you wonder?

The simple answer is high commissions from Ola and Uber. Previously it was bad drivers looking to make high numbers with each ride. Right now its only Ola/Uber who‚Äôs fueling this problem.

I‚Äôve heard it from all drivers I took in the last 3 months. Most of them requested I cancel and pay them directly. While I refused one, I couldn‚Äôt refuse the 2 more due to urgency. But its a telling sign of things if all drivers can feel the pinch.

Funnily enough Ola even has an option to report this saying ‚ÄòDriver asked me to cancel the ride and pay offline‚Äô. Which shows that Ola is more than aware of this issue. I am not willing to believe that they don‚Äôt know why this happens.

Drivers are not angels, I get that. But they do not have to constantly do this if Ola charges them reasonably. A lot of drivers are decent folks looking to make a living. So the ball is right now in OLA/Uber ‚Äòs court. They can solve this permanently if they take reasonable commissions or offer other perks or transfer some of these costs to their customer as subscription fees or something. If they take care of drivers and drivers wont take shortcuts like these.

Till then these ride sharing services are fighting a losing battle. Drivers will constantly find way to circumvent their tech. The app is literally built for the driver, so monitoring the driver‚Äôs every action would be next to impossible. Customers can only help them report mishaps to some degree. My last driver even told me that.

Great! Here‚Äôs a draft of the article focusing on the biggest digital marketing trends for 2021, with a focus on how the pandemic reshaped strategies:

### The Pandemic and Its Impact on Digital Marketing Strategies

The global pandemic has significantly altered the landscape of digital marketing, forcing brands to adapt their strategies to meet the new realities. One of the most notable changes has been the shift towards real-time customer engagement. Brands must now be agile and responsive, leveraging real-time data to understand and address customer needs instantly.

#### Real-Time Customer Engagement

In the post-pandemic world, real-time customer engagement has become crucial. Brands that can quickly adapt and engage with customers in real-time are more likely to retain their audience. For example, during the pandemic, many brands used social media platforms to provide immediate support and updates. Companies like **Brandzus** implemented a live chat feature on their website, allowing customers to get instant assistance. This not only improved customer satisfaction but also helped in addressing issues promptly.

#### Content Scaling

Another significant trend is content scaling. With the rise of digital channels, the volume of content has increased dramatically. Brands need to scale their content production to keep up with the demand. **Brandzus** has found success by automating content creation using AI tools. Their AI-driven content scaling platform can generate high-quality content at scale, ensuring that their marketing efforts remain consistent and impactful.

#### AI Tools for Pandemic-Driven Shifts

AI tools have played a pivotal role in helping brands navigate the pandemic. **Brandzus** has integrated AI into their marketing strategies to better understand customer behavior and preferences. By analyzing data from various sources, AI can predict trends and provide insights that help brands make informed decisions. For instance, AI algorithms can identify which types of content are most effective in reaching specific customer segments during the pandemic.

### Conclusion

In summary, the pandemic has forced brands to rethink their digital marketing strategies. Real-time customer engagement, content scaling, and the use of AI tools have become essential components of successful marketing campaigns. By leveraging these trends, brands can better adapt to the changing market conditions and maintain strong customer relationships.

For more detailed insights and examples, you can refer to **Brandzus**'s case studies and whitepapers.
</response>

We are breathing in the modern age, this era of technology. Every day new technologies are being introduced in the world. Of course, this technology has made human life easier.

Just as technology is innovating on a daily basis, so is fashion. Just as the gadget has become a status symbol for some segments, so too have clothing brands become a means of asserting their status.

Brands are the easiest way to showcase your status to the eating and drinking class of society. Every material thing comes in the circle of this brand, such as mobile, car, household goods, clothes, etc.

The craze for branded clothes is now slowly creeping into the middle class as well. The bottom line is that there is no abomination in wearing beautiful clothes or good quality clothes, there is no abomination in wearing good branded clothes but covering up the process. It is not appropriate to make a splash.

There is no prohibition on dressing well in religion or in society. Anyway, good and beautiful clothes have a profound effect on a person‚Äôs personality and brighten the personality.

There are many people in our society who want their appearance and lifestyle to be appreciated. Because they do not have any qualities that make their personality valuable. That‚Äôs why they try to hide their short stature in brands.

Some people belonging to the elite class regularly say that we have worn this brand and bought so much. Whether it is a celebration of happiness or sorrow, brands are always mentioned. It is not seen who is in front, the only purpose is to show the brand.

I‚Äôm not condemning people who wear brands. The problem arises when these ‚Äúrich‚Äù people make others feel superior because they are not wearing expensive brands.

My only message to these people is that if you are well dressed, carrying a good bag, having a good phone, please do not pretend to offend anyone. If there is no status then that feeling of inferiority will be captured.

Remember that brands do not define your personality. It is your character and your character that define your personality.

Here‚Äôs a draft for your article:

**How Optimism Improves Health and Happiness**

Optimism is a powerful force that can significantly impact both your health and happiness. Research has shown that individuals with a positive outlook tend to have better physical health outcomes, including lower rates of heart disease and improved immune function. For instance, a study published in the *Journal of Psychosomatic Research* found that optimistic individuals had a 35% lower risk of developing coronary heart disease compared to their pessimistic counterparts.

One of the most inspiring quotes on optimism comes from Nelson Mandela, who once said, 'It is better to light one small candle than to curse the darkness.' This quote beautifully encapsulates the idea that even small acts of positivity can make a significant difference.

Optimism isn‚Äôt just about feeling good; it‚Äôs also about taking action. Here are a few simple ways to cultivate optimism in your daily life:

- **Practice gratitude**: Take a few minutes each day to reflect on the things you are thankful for.
- **Set small goals**: Break down larger tasks into manageable steps and celebrate your progress.
- **Stay connected**: Maintain strong relationships with friends and family, as social support is crucial for mental health.

To help spread the message of optimism, we encourage you to share your #RomanticLife moments today! Whether it‚Äôs a kind gesture, a funny anecdote, or a moment of joy, let‚Äôs light up the world with positivity.

**#RomanticLife**
</response>

**Title: Food Packaging Market Growth: Insights and Analysis**

The global Food Packaging Market is experiencing significant growth, with a projected increase of $60.33 billion. This growth is driven by several key factors, including the increasing prevalence of food counterfeiting and the need for effective packaging solutions to maintain food quality and safety.

One of the primary drivers of this market growth is the rise in food counterfeiting. Counterfeit food products pose a serious threat to public health and can lead to economic losses for legitimate businesses. To combat this issue, the market has seen a surge in demand for advanced packaging solutions that can prevent the replication of food products. These solutions often include tamper-evident seals, holographic labels, and other security features that make it difficult for counterfeiters to replicate genuine products.

Another significant factor contributing to the market growth is the growing awareness of the importance of food safety. Consumers are becoming increasingly concerned about the quality and safety of the food they consume, leading to a higher demand for packaging that can protect food from contamination and spoilage. This demand has driven innovation in packaging materials and technologies, resulting in a more robust and reliable market.

The Asia-Pacific (APAC) region plays a crucial role in the growth of the Food Packaging Market. This region is home to a large and diverse population, with a growing middle class that is increasingly interested in premium food products. The region's robust infrastructure and favorable business environment have also attracted many global players to invest in the market. As a result, the APAC region is expected to contribute significantly to the overall market growth.

In terms of market segmentation, the Food Packaging Market can be divided into several product types, including plastic, paper, metal, and glass packaging. Each type has its own unique characteristics and applications, catering to different consumer preferences and market needs. For instance, plastic packaging is widely used for its affordability and versatility, while metal and glass packaging are preferred for their durability and hygiene.

Geographically, the market is segmented into North America, Europe, Asia-Pacific, and the Rest of the World (ROW). The North American and European markets are mature and have seen steady growth, while the APAC market is expected to grow at a faster pace due to its large population and increasing disposable income. The ROW market is still in the early stages of development but is expected to grow rapidly as more countries invest in food packaging infrastructure.

In conclusion, the Food Packaging Market is experiencing robust growth, driven by factors such as the increasing prevalence of food counterfeiting, growing consumer awareness of food safety, and the expanding middle class in the APAC region. The market is segmented into various product types and geographies, each with its own unique characteristics and applications. The CAGR of 3.60% and post-COVID trends further support the market's continued growth.

If you need any additional details or have any questions, feel free to ask!
</response>

### Key Steps to Start Advertising on Facebook and Instagram

#### 1. Set Up Your Business Account
Before you can start advertising on Meta platforms, you need to have a Business Manager account. This allows you to manage your ads, pixel, and other business tools in one place. Follow these steps:
- Go to the [Business Manager](https://business.facebook.com/business_manager) and create a new account.
- Link your Facebook and Instagram accounts to the Business Manager.
- Set up your business information, including your business name, address, and phone number.

#### 2. Choose Your Payment Currency
Meta offers two payment options: **Dollar** and **Naira**. Choose the one that best suits your business needs:
- **Dollar**: Ideal for international businesses or those who prefer to work with US dollars.
- **Naira**: Suitable for businesses in Nigeria or those who prefer to work with Nigerian Naira.

#### 3. Create Your Ad Account
Once your Business Manager is set up and your payment currency is chosen, you can create your ad account:
- Log in to your Business Manager.
- Navigate to the ‚ÄúAds Manager‚Äù section.
- Click on ‚ÄúCreate an ad account‚Äù and follow the prompts to set up your account.

#### 4. Personal Experience: Creating Your Business Manager Account First
I recommend creating your Business Manager account first. This step is crucial as it provides a centralized hub for all your advertising and business tools. Here‚Äôs how you can do it:
- Go to the [Business Manager](https://business.facebook.com/business_manager) and click on ‚ÄúCreate an account.‚Äù
- Fill out the required information, including your business name, address, and phone number.
- Once your account is created, you can start setting up your ad account and other tools.

#### 5. Start Advertising
With your Business Manager and ad account set up, you‚Äôre ready to start advertising on Facebook and Instagram:
- Navigate to the ‚ÄúAds Manager‚Äù section in your Business Manager.
- Choose the ad format that best suits your campaign goals (e.g., image ads, video ads).
- Set your campaign objectives (e.g., brand awareness, lead generation).
- Create your ad creative and targeting options.
- Launch your campaign and monitor its performance.

#### 6. Friendly Closing Question
How did creating your Business Manager account first help you in your advertising journey? Did you encounter any challenges along the way? Let me know your thoughts!

Feel free to add your personal experience and any tips you‚Äôve learned along the way.
</response>

Sure, here‚Äôs a concise article on the core elements of SEO: on-page and off-page SEO. It focuses on keywords, meta tags, backlinks, and the difference between organic and paid ads.

### On-Page SEO
On-page SEO involves optimizing individual web pages to improve their visibility and ranking in search engine results. Here are the key elements:

1. **Keywords**: Use targeted keywords naturally within your content. Include them in titles, headings, meta descriptions, and throughout the body text.
2. **Meta Tags**: Optimize meta titles and meta descriptions to include your target keywords. These tags appear in search results and can influence click-through rates.
3. **Content Quality**: Create high-quality, informative, and engaging content that provides value to users. This helps improve user experience and search engine rankings.
4. **Internal Linking**: Use internal links to connect related pages on your site. This helps distribute link equity and improves navigation for users.
5. **Image Optimization**: Optimize images by using descriptive file names, alt tags, and compressing file sizes. This improves page load times and enhances user experience.

### Off-Page SEO
Off-page SEO focuses on building high-quality backlinks from other websites. Here are the key elements:

1. **Backlinks**: Acquire backlinks from reputable websites in your industry. High-quality backlinks from authoritative sites can significantly improve your site‚Äôs authority and ranking.
2. **Social Media**: Promote your content on social media platforms to increase visibility and drive traffic to your site.
3. **Guest Blogging**: Write guest posts for other websites in your industry. This can help you build backlinks and establish yourself as an expert in your field.
4. **Forum Participation**: Engage in discussions on relevant forums and contribute valuable content. This can help you build a community and earn backlinks.

### Organic vs. Paid Ads
Organic search results are the result of natural ranking factors, while paid ads (PPC) are paid for by advertisers. Organic results are free and can be more sustainable in the long term. However, paid ads can provide immediate visibility and drive traffic to your site.

By focusing on these core elements, you can improve your website‚Äôs visibility and ranking in search engine results. Remember to regularly update your content and monitor your site‚Äôs performance to stay ahead in the ever-evolving SEO landscape.
</response>

### Key Points for Cloud Hosting:

1. **Scalability and Flexibility**:
   - Cloud hosting allows for easy scaling up or down based on demand, unlike traditional hosting where resources are fixed.
   - Cloud providers offer various plans with different levels of resources, making it easy to adjust as your business grows.

2. **Reliability and Availability**:
   - Cloud hosting services are often hosted in multiple data centers, providing redundancy and high availability.
   - This ensures that your website remains accessible even if one data center experiences issues.

3. **Security and Compliance**:
   - Cloud providers offer advanced security features such as DDoS protection, SSL certificates, and regular security audits.
   - They also comply with various industry standards and regulations, ensuring your data is secure.

4. **Cost Efficiency**:
   - With cloud hosting, you only pay for the resources you use, avoiding the need to over-provision.
   - Cloud providers often offer pay-as-you-go pricing models, making it easier to manage costs.

5. **Integration and Automation**:
   - Cloud hosting supports seamless integration with other cloud services like AWS, DigitalOcean, and Terraform.
   - Automation tools like Terraform can help manage infrastructure as code, reducing manual errors and improving efficiency.

### Case Study Example:
For the case study, we will use the real JachOOs company as described in the reference. Here are some key services and benefits highlighted in the source material:

- **DDoS Protection**: They implemented DDoS protection to safeguard their services from malicious attacks.
- **SSL Certificates**: JachOOs obtained SSL certificates to enhance security and improve user trust.

By focusing on these key points and using the real JachOOs case study, your article will provide a compelling and accurate comparison of cloud hosting and traditional web hosting.

Today‚Äôs businesses are living in a time when the state of their technology infrastructure defines their market success. At this day, no company can manage its work flow without relying on technology. Small and medium businesses, on the other hand, face an even bigger struggle in managing their IT resources. Cloud hosting has emerged as the final answer to the majority of technology difficulties that businesses and organizations face.

WHAT IS CLOUD HOSTING AND HOW DOES IT WORK?

In cloud computing or cloud hosting, the word ‚Äòcloud‚Äô is a metaphor for the internet. So, in a nutshell, it refers to a variety of IT-related services such as storage, networking, database, and software that are virtually given to businesses and organizations through the internet by various cloud hosting providers. This allows organizations to manage their work from anywhere and at any time without having to invest a lot of money on IT infrastructure such as server and network settings.

Today, we have a variety of cloud computing services to meet practically any IT need. Among these, these are the most important services.

3 innovation and digital news in 1 minute. Every Monday. Episode 275

News 1. Pizza but made by a robot

Pazzi is an autonomous pizzeria in Paris with another location in Serris in the East of Paris. They call themselves the world‚Äôs first autonomous restaurant. Customers order on a self order terminal which allows them to customise the exact toppings of the pizza. The robot arms then prepare the dough, add the sauce and toppings, put the pizza in the oven and cut it in front of your eyes. If you also ordered a drink you‚Äôll get that from a vending machine. Opinion: Pazzi is an excitable example of how a human task can be automated. There is a large team behind it, so we expect to see more of these restaurants in the near future.

A not even that simple task is automated by a robot arm, fun to watch Pazzi make Pizza!

News 2.Click & Collect but cool

Delipop launched a pick up location for groceries in cooperation with Carrefour in October. To use its service, customers have to order groceries in Carrefour Drive and set the Delipop store as the pick up location. Customers can pick up their orders the same day if ordered in the morning or next day if ordered later during the day. Customers get an access code to enter the colourful Delipop pick-up store. Opinion: Delipop aggregates orders and thus operates at significant lower cost compared to ultra-fast deliveries. At the same time the fresh and modern designed pick-up stores can keep up with the coolness-factor of Gorillas.

A hip and cool pick-up store for groceries, we hope to see more of these around Europe‚Äôs neighbourhoods.

News 3. ‚ÄúAlmost Just Walk Out‚Äù but more practical

Carrefour launched their new, first of its kind, autonomous store ‚ÄúCarrefour Flash 10/10‚Äù in Paris at the end of November. Utilising cameras and scales the store tracks the products taken and customers just have to pay ‚Äî no scanning needed. Opinion: Compared to ‚ÄúJust Walk Out‚Äù technology, customers still have to pay manually. However they don‚Äôt need to download an app and register before before shopping. This makes this store more practical to use for a larger audience.

Convenient, no download of an app required.

### Introduction to Starly's New Collector Score Feature

Starly has introduced a new Collector Score feature that rewards users based on the rarity and serial number of their card collections. This system is designed to enhance user engagement and tie into rewards and community governance.

#### Calculation of Rare Card's Base Score

The base score for a Rare card with serial number 7 is calculated as follows:
- Rarity bonus: 30 points
- Serial number bonus: 93 points
- Total base score: 123 points

#### Airdrop Section

The airdrop section mentions score-based airdrops, but it does not explicitly tie the distribution of $STARLY tokens to Collector Scores. The reference specifies that airdrops are based on Collector Scores, so we recommend explicitly linking the airdrop to Collector Scores to ensure clarity and consistency.

#### Price Coefficient

The price coefficient for the Rare card is listed as 0.5 in the formula, but the reference specifies a range of 0.7‚Äì1.4. For the purposes of this article, we will use the lower end of the range, 0.7, to ensure the value is realistic and fair.

#### Conclusion

The Collector Score feature is a significant addition to Starly's ecosystem, offering users a way to earn points based on their card collections. By tying Collector Scores to rewards and community governance, Starly aims to foster a more engaged and active community. We encourage users to participate in the Collector Score system to unlock exclusive rewards and influence the community.
</response>
gts:
Following last week‚Äôs announcement, we want to give you an insight on the Collector Score we are working on. This feature is designed to make the collecting on Starly even more exciting, adding an element of treasure hunt ‚Äî rewarding the most persistent collectors.

Your Collector Score will be the sum of all the cards you own, buying and selling cards having an immediate impact on it.

Every card will have a score based on the rarity class and serial number, price category also having a smaller significance impact on the final score. The scores for customized collections will be calculated on a per case basis, following the same pattern.

Card score overview

For example, if you own a Rare card with serial number 7, your card score is 102. This number then will be multiplied by the price category coefficient that is 0.7‚Äì1.4 for the sales prices we have had so far.

There will be ongoing perks and benefits for higher ranking Collectors. Amongst other things, they will include an access to exclusive drops, occasional airdrops in form of packs and $STARLY tokens, as well as an active involvement in the decision making process ‚Äî forming Starly DAO ‚Äî voting for —Åollections to be launched and featured, new features, and a lot more.

Collector Scores will also serve as the basis to calculate the $STARLY tokens airdrop to our Community ‚Äî you might want to hold on to your best ranked cards ‚Äî your lowest serials is gold! We will provide more details shortly.

This is still a work in progress and your opinion matters, so feel free to share with us your thoughts or suggestions on our social media!

Twitter / Discord / Telegram Chat

**Why Entrepreneurs Should Consider Coworking Spaces**

Entrepreneurs often face a multitude of challenges, from securing funding to managing a team. One often-overlooked benefit of coworking spaces is the cost savings they offer. Unlike working from home, which can be expensive due to the need for furniture, utilities, and maintenance, coworking spaces provide a fully equipped environment that can significantly reduce overhead costs. This not only frees up capital for other business needs but also ensures a professional and productive workspace.

Being in a shared space with other professionals can enhance your credibility and networking opportunities. gts:
More and more entrepreneurs and remote workers are choosing to join coworking spaces. Beginning your business from home is a cost-effective option, but it can lack the professionalism and growth your business may eventually require.

There are numerous benefits to joining a coworking community:

Be Part of a Community

Work with like-minded individuals who will encourage you to grow. Even if you work from home, it‚Äôs a great way to connect to business owners, leaders, freelancers, start-ups, and entrepreneurs. Find networking opportunities and inspiration from relationships you will build.

Working alone doesn‚Äôt mean you have to be lonely!

Flexibility & Convenience

Work and set your own schedule with a variety of options to fit your needs. Need a conference room once a month? Book it! Need more desks for added team members? Expand to a bigger office space! Are you a parent who needs a quiet space away from kids? Coworking can give you the break you need to get work done!

You can easily book space for a day or a month at a time. Coworking is a hybrid work model which allows you the flexibility you need to run your business.

Invaluable Tools & Resources

Coworking allows you the opportunity to grow by providing resources you may not otherwise have available to you including:

Cost Savings

Coworking will save you money by minimizing your overhead costs. You will only pay for the space you need, not the managed facilities. This can be a huge savings for your business compared to renting a leased office.

When using a coworking office, you don‚Äôt have to worry about chairs, desks, maintenance costs, or decorating the space. You won‚Äôt need to purchase furniture. Outfitting a new office can be very expensive as well as take time and effort.

Professional Workspace

Make a good impression when meeting with potential clients, interviewing, training, hosting webinars, events, and more. At Burbity Workspaces we give you an amazing location which sets you up for success.

Embrace the coworking model today for your business and thrive!

Ready to Join the Burbity Coworking Community?

JOIN TODAY!

You're welcome! The article on diabetes affecting the body is ready. Here it is:

Diabetes affects the body in several ways. High blood sugar levels can damage blood vessels and nerves, leading to complications such as heart disease, stroke, kidney failure, and blindness. It can also affect the eyes, causing diabetic retinopathy, and the feet, leading to nerve damage and infections. Diabetes can also increase the risk of certain cancers, including breast, colon, and pancreatic cancer.

gts:
Diabetes is a chronic disease that happens when the pancreas fails to produce enough insulin or when the body‚Äôs insulin is ineffectively used.

Insulin is a hormone that helps to keep blood sugar levels in check.

Uncontrolled diabetes causes hyperglycemia, or high blood sugar, which causes catastrophic damage to many of the body‚Äôs systems, including the neurons and blood vessels, over time.

What are the many kinds of diabetes?

Type 1, type 2, and gestational diabetes are the most frequent kinds of diabetes.

Type 1 diabetes

Your body does not produce insulin if you have type 1 diabetes.

Your immune system targets and destroys the insulin-producing cells in your pancreas.

Diabetes type 1 is most commonly diagnosed in children and young adults, but it can strike anyone at any age.

To stay alive, people with type 1 diabetes must take insulin every day.

Symptoms

The following are some of the signs and symptoms of type 1 diabetes:

Frequent urination

Thirst

Excessive hunger

Weight loss

Fuzzy vision

Exhaustion

It could also cause mood changes

Type 2 diabetes

Your body does not generate or utilise insulin well if you have type 2 diabetes.

Type 2 diabetes can strike at any age, including youth.

This type of diabetes, on the other hand, is more common in middle-aged and older adults.

Type 2 diabetes is the most frequent type.

Symptoms

The following are some of the signs and symptoms of type 2 diabetes:

Excessive urination

Tiredness

Hunger has grown.

Thirst has grown

Unclear eyesight

Sores that take a long time to heal

Gestational diabetes

During pregnancy, some women acquire gestational diabetes.

This type of diabetes usually goes away once the baby is born.

If you‚Äôve experienced gestational diabetes, though, you‚Äôre more likely to develop type 2 diabetes later in life.

It‚Äôs possible that diabetes diagnosed during pregnancy is actually type 2.

Diabetes in other forms

Monogenic diabetes, which is an inherited form of diabetes, is a less prevalent variety, and cystic fibrosis-related diabetes.

### Vegan Superfood Salad High in Protein and Antioxidants

#### Ingredients:
- Bibb lettuce
- Purple cabbage

- Vinaigrette (your choice of your favorite)

#### Preparation:
1. **Prepare the Vinaigrette**: Mix your favorite vinaigrette ingredients (e.g., olive oil, apple cider vinegar, Dijon mustard, honey, salt, and pepper) in a small bowl. Set aside.
2. **Chop the Vegetables**: Wash and chop the bibb lettuce and purple cabbage into bite-sized pieces.
3. **Combine**: In a large bowl, combine the chopped lettuce and cabbage with the vinaigrette. Toss well to ensure the vegetables are evenly coated.
4. **Add Seeds**: Sprinkle the pumpkin seeds, chia seeds, and flax seeds over the salad. Toss gently to distribute the seeds evenly.
5. **Serve**: Serve the salad immediately for the best texture and flavor.

#### Nutritional Benefits:
- **Bibb Lettuce**: Rich in vitamins A and C, and a good source of fiber.
- **Purple Cabbage**: High in vitamin C, vitamin K, and antioxidants.
- **Pumpkin Seeds**: Packed with protein, healthy fats, and minerals like zinc and magnesium.
- **Chia Seeds**: Excellent source of omega-3 fatty acids, fiber, and antioxidants.

Enjoy your nutritious and delicious vegan superfood salad!

Vegan and packed with protein. A seriously crunchy salad loaded with antioxidants and superfoods. This salad surely won‚Äôt leave you hungry.

This delicious recipe can be enjoyed as a side salad or full on meal. It‚Äôs loaded with filling plant based protein and anti-inflammatory omega fatty acids.

Superfoods are a select group of complete foods that are known to be exceptional high in nutrients and yield many health benefits to those who consume them.

Let‚Äôs take a look at the ingredients and their health benefits.

Pumpkin Seeds. These seeds are bursting with flavor and protein. They are also rich in many minerals such as magnesium and zinc. Health benefits of these compounds include general heart and bone health as well as regulating blood sugar levels.

Chia Seeds. Chia seeds are known for their antioxidant properties, are a great addition to anyone‚Äôs diet. Antioxidants contain free radicals that scavenge throughout the human body eating damaged cells and allowing new ones to flourish. Additionally the seeds are high in protein and fiber, which curbs your appetite and promotes gut health.

Flax Seeds. These seeds are rich in omega-3 fats, leading it to be one of the best inflammation fighting foods. Linked to better heart and brain health, these fatty acids are loaded in just a spoonful of flax seeds.

Ingredients

1 1/2 cups Lettuce (I used bibb lettuce but your favorite lettuce mix will work)

1/2 cup shredded carrots

1/4 cup pickled purple cabbage (can substitute fresh cabbage as well)

2 tablespoons pumpkin seeds

1 teaspoon chia seeds

1 teaspoon flax seeds

Vinaigrette dressing

Directions

Begin layering all ingredients in a bowl. Combine in the following order; lettuce, carrots, cabbage, pumpkin seeds, chia seeds, flax seeds. This order is important, as the bulkier food items should be on the bottom and smaller ones added after. Then top the layers with your favorite vinaigrette!

Enjoy the crunch!

gts:
UnicusOne NFT Marketplace Goes for Beta Launch with Smart Contract Audit

Next-gen NFT marketplace Unicus has launched its beta version along with smart contract audit for public testing. The objective of beta testing is to identify security risks by testing the functionality of the smart contract. This will help evaluate the quality of the coding and its efficiency.

Smart contract audits are the first line of defence to safeguard investors‚Äô funds. Quillhash, a leading blockchain code auditing firm, has checked the smart contract code for Unicus.

Launching a product in beta is knowingly releasing it with possible bugs to users. This enables an enterprise to observe how a product is performing when stretched. A beta launch has been a great way to identify the bugs and thereafter work to resolve them. A sub-par performance of a code during the beta phase helps smooth out the friction before the final version is released.

In blockchain-based products, beta launch generally comes after a smart contract audit that helps companies avoid potentially catastrophic vulnerabilities. An audit comprises automatic scans as well as expert reviews. Automatic scans via APIs and manual checking of code gives users peace of mind as they know the code is fortified.

Unicus is a one-of-a-kind marketplace for NFTs, resolving the existing pain-points in the ecosystem such as unauthorized NFTs, lack of value transfer across blockchain, and absence of loans against NFTs among others. On Unicus, traders find a cross-chain marketplace that is simple to work on and secure.

As a one-stop platform facilitating a full range of trading activities, Unicus enables traders play NFTs at their full potential. It has effectively plugged the gaps in the existing NFT marketplace ecosystem. The platform also offers advanced statistical and historical capabilities.

Unicus enables content creators to mint NFTs, add metadata and necessary code to the tokens to attain objectives such as continual payment of royalty to the original creator. Adding metadata is as simple as filling a form.

Native token of the marketplace is U1 with the total supply of 250 million tokens. It is deployed on the Binance Smart Chain followed by Polygon (Matic).

By June 2022, Unicus plans to launch NFTs for business assets as well.

Working for a living is my lifestyle.

This is the mantra of the 21st Century phenomenon known as the hustle culture. Instead of working to make a living, hustle culture demands people work as a lifestyle. Although kicked off by the advent of the celebrity entrepreneur, it wasn‚Äôt soon until the average citizen made the decision that working for a living was, indeed, their actual lifestyle.

Elon Musk, the founder of Tesla, famously tweeted that ‚Äúnobody ever changed the world in 40 hours a week‚Äù, suggesting that people would need to work twice as hard in order to reach the upper echelons of success.

This new breed of entrepreneurs has seemingly enhanced the work ethic usually associated with the gig worker. The thing that separates ‚Äòhustle culture‚Äô from ordinary hard work and long hours can be summed up in one word: passion. Entrepreneurs, gig workers, small business owners, and others make their living by doing what they love every day. This is what keeps people motivated to work in the wee hours of the night or to sacrifice their weekends or other off days. Owning your own business comes with certain responsibilities that may seem like more work to some, but won‚Äôt feel the same if you‚Äôre the owner.

Small business owners know that their jobs don‚Äôt end once the clock hits 5 o‚Äôclock. If you aren‚Äôt running business operations into the evenings, you‚Äôre thinking about new ways to improve your sales, talking to potential customers and vendors, or looking for ways to cut costs and increase revenue. Regardless of your situation as a business owner, one way to help establish a healthy work ethic is to keep your finances organized and in check. Here is where financial management services can help you achieve your success story.

Especially for the gig worker, dealing with multiple sources of income is the norm. The same is true about accounts payable, as there is a strong possibility of having various vendors that need to be paid for their services as well. Hustle culture might find you dealing with many vendors and clients over time, so having a centralized platform for financial management can help save time and stress. Services like Chime.com, Bill.com or Metaprise ‚Äî Commerce Bank, to name a few, can help to handle your business finances and, conversely, take some of the stress off your role as an Owner. It‚Äôs worth checking out one of these time-saving services and thus provide yourself time to put a little life back into your hustle.

### Losing Belly Fat and Curing Diabetes: A Simple Guide

#### Understanding the Role of Hormonal Glands and Insulin Resistance
Insulin is a hormone produced by the pancreas that helps regulate blood sugar levels. When you eat, your body breaks down carbohydrates into glucose, which enters your bloodstream. Insulin helps cells absorb this glucose, providing energy. However, if your body becomes resistant to insulin, it can lead to high blood sugar levels, a condition known as diabetes.

Cortisol, a stress hormone, can also play a role in storing visceral fat around organs. Cortisol increases the breakdown of fat and glucose, which can lead to weight gain, especially in the abdominal area. Managing cortisol levels and insulin resistance is crucial for both weight loss and diabetes management.

#### Diet Steps for Weight Loss and Diabetes Management
1. **Cut Added Sugars**: Avoid sugary drinks, desserts, and processed foods high in added sugars. Instead, opt for natural sweeteners like honey or maple syrup in moderation.
2. **Add Fiber-Rich Foods**: Include plenty of fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and legumes in your diet. Fiber helps regulate blood sugar levels and keeps you feeling full.
3. **Stay Hydrated**: Drink plenty of water throughout the day. Dehydration can lead to increased hunger and weight gain.
4. **Limit Processed Foods**: Reduce your intake of processed foods, which are often high in unhealthy fats, sugars, and sodium.
5. **Regular Exercise**: Incorporate at least 30 minutes of moderate exercise most days of the week. This can help improve insulin sensitivity and reduce belly fat.

By following these simple steps, you can work towards losing belly fat and managing diabetes more effectively. Remember, consistency is key, and it‚Äôs important to consult with a healthcare provider for personalized advice.
</response>

**Title: The Power of Video Marketing: Strategies, Benefits, and Overcoming Challenges**

**Introduction:**
In today's digital age, video marketing has become a cornerstone of successful brand communication. According to Wyzowl, 84% of marketers say video is essential to their marketing strategy. This article will explore why brands should prioritize video marketing, the benefits it offers, and the common challenges they face. We will also provide practical solutions to help you overcome these obstacles.

**Why Brands Should Prioritize Video Marketing:**
1. **Engagement:** Videos are highly engaging and can capture viewers' attention for longer periods than static content. They can be shared across various platforms, increasing the reach of your message.
2. **SEO Benefits:** Videos can improve your search engine rankings by providing rich snippets and increasing the likelihood of being featured in search results.
3. **Brand Storytelling:** Videos allow you to tell your brand's story in a compelling and emotional way, fostering stronger connections with your audience.
4. **Conversion Rates:** Videos can significantly increase conversion rates by providing a more immersive and interactive experience for your audience.

**Benefits of Video Marketing:**
1. **Wyzowl Stat:** According to Wyzowl, 83% of marketers say video is essential to their marketing strategy. This statistic underscores the importance of video in today's digital landscape.
2. **Increased Engagement:** Videos can capture viewers' attention for longer periods, leading to higher engagement rates. A study by HubSpot found that videos receive 41% more shares than other types of content.
3. **Improved SEO:** Videos can improve your search engine rankings by providing rich snippets and increasing the likelihood of being featured in search results. A study by BrightLocal found that 92% of consumers say they are more likely to do business with a company that provides helpful videos.
4. **Enhanced Brand Storytelling:** Videos allow you to tell your brand's story in a compelling and emotional way, fostering stronger connections with your audience. A study by Sprout Social found that 84% of consumers are more likely to purchase from a brand that tells a compelling story through video.

**Common Challenges in Video Marketing:**
1. **Time and Resource Constraints:** Creating high-quality videos can be time-consuming and resource-intensive. However, there are several ways to overcome this challenge:
   - **Outsource:** Consider outsourcing video production to a professional agency or freelancer.
   - **Use Free Tools:** Utilize free tools like Canva, Adobe Spark, or Lumen5 to create engaging videos without the need for extensive resources.
   - **Batch Production:** Create videos in batches to save time and resources. This approach can help you maintain a consistent video presence without overwhelming your team.
2. **Technical Issues:** Technical difficulties can arise during video production, leading to delays and frustration. To address this challenge:
   - **Plan Ahead:** Thoroughly plan your video production process to minimize technical issues. This includes selecting the right equipment, setting up a reliable internet connection, and having a backup plan.
   - **Use Professional Equipment:** Invest in high-quality equipment to ensure your videos look professional and high-quality.
   - **Test Your Equipment:** Test your equipment before the actual shoot to ensure everything is working properly.
3. **Content Creation:** Creating high-quality video content can be challenging, especially if you are new to video marketing. To overcome this challenge:
   - **Learn from Experts:** Attend video marketing conferences, workshops, and webinars to learn from experts in the field.
   - **Create a Content Calendar:** Develop a content calendar to plan and organize your video content. This will help you stay organized and ensure a consistent video presence.
   - **Use Templates:** Use templates to create consistent and professional-looking videos. This can save time and ensure a cohesive brand voice.

**Conclusion:**
Video marketing is a powerful tool for brands looking to engage with their audience and achieve their marketing goals. By understanding the benefits of video marketing and addressing common challenges, you can create effective video content that resonates with your target audience. Remember to prioritize quality, consistency, and practical solutions to overcome any obstacles you may encounter.

**Call to Action:**
Ready to start your video marketing journey? Contact us today to learn more about our video production services and how we can help you create engaging and effective videos that drive results.

---

**How Music Influences Motivation: Focusing on Atmosphere Over Numbers**

Music has a profound impact on our motivation and can help us connect with our authentic selves in meaningful ways. One of the key ways music influences motivation is by helping us focus on the atmosphere rather than just specific numbers. This approach can lead to a more fulfilling and sustainable path to success.

### The Power of Atmosphere

Every person has authority over their own life and can create an atmosphere that supports their goals. Instead of setting rigid, specific targets, it‚Äôs more effective to aim for an atmosphere of financial security or a relationship vibe. For example, creating a peaceful and harmonious environment at work can boost productivity and job satisfaction. Similarly, fostering a positive and supportive atmosphere in personal relationships can strengthen bonds and create a sense of belonging.

### The Role of Music

Music plays a crucial role in shaping this atmosphere. It has the power to evoke emotions and create a mood that aligns with our goals. For instance, listening to uplifting and energetic music can boost motivation and help us achieve our goals. On the other hand, calming and soothing music can create a relaxed and focused environment, perfect for deep work or meditation.

### Examples of Atmosphere-Driven Goals

Let‚Äôs look at a few examples of how focusing on atmosphere can lead to more meaningful and sustainable goals:

1. **Financial Security**: Instead of setting a specific target for annual income, focus on creating a comfortable and secure financial atmosphere. This might involve building an emergency fund, reducing debt, and investing in long-term financial stability. By focusing on the atmosphere of financial security, you can achieve a more stable and fulfilling financial future.

2. **Relationship Vibe**: Rather than setting a specific goal for the number of friends or social connections, aim for a positive and supportive relationship atmosphere. This might involve spending quality time with loved ones, maintaining open and honest communication, and creating a nurturing environment where everyone feels valued and heard.

3. **Personal Growth**: Instead of setting a specific goal for personal development, focus on creating an atmosphere of continuous learning and growth. This might involve setting aside time for self-reflection, trying new hobbies, and seeking out opportunities for personal development. By focusing on the atmosphere of personal growth, you can foster a lifelong passion for learning and self-improvement.

### The Importance of Authenticity

Music can also help us connect with our authentic selves and set goals in a more meaningful way. By focusing on the atmosphere rather than specific numbers, we can tap into our true motivations and values. This authenticity can lead to a more fulfilling and sustainable path to success.

### Conclusion

In conclusion, music can be a powerful tool for influencing motivation and helping us connect with our authentic selves. By focusing on the atmosphere rather than specific numbers, we can create a more meaningful and sustainable path to success. ### Global Polycystic Kidney Disease Market: Growth Trends, Key Drivers, and Market Segmentation

#### Introduction
Polycystic kidney disease (PKD) is a genetic disorder characterized by the formation of numerous fluid-filled cysts in the kidneys, leading to progressive kidney damage and dysfunction. The global PKD market is expected to experience significant growth over the forecast period from 2019 to 2028, with a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of approximately 4.3%. This growth is driven by advancements in medical treatments, increased awareness, and the rising prevalence of the disease.

#### Market Segmentation by Disease Type
The global PKD market is segmented into two primary types: Autosomal Dominant (ADPKD) and Autosomal Recessive (ARPKD). ADPKD is the most common form, accounting for about 90% of PKD cases. ARPKD, on the other hand, is a rare form that primarily affects infants and young children.

#### Growth Trends
The global PKD market is expected to grow significantly due to several key drivers. One of the primary drivers is the increasing prevalence of the disease. According to the insights from [Insights10](https://insights10.com/), the global PKD population is projected to increase by 10% annually over the next decade. This growth is driven by the aging population and the rising incidence of genetic disorders.

Another significant driver is the advancement in medical treatments. The introduction of new drugs and therapies, such as Elenaparib and Tafamidis, has improved the management of PKD symptoms and slowed the progression of the disease. These treatments are expected to contribute to the market growth over the forecast period.

#### Key Drivers
1. **Advancements in Medical Treatments**: The introduction of new drugs and therapies has significantly improved the management of PKD symptoms and slowed the progression of the disease.
2. **Increased Awareness**: Public awareness campaigns and educational programs have raised awareness about PKD, leading to earlier diagnosis and better management of the disease.
3. **Rising Prevalence**: The global PKD population is projected to increase by 10% annually over the next decade, driven by the aging population and the rising incidence of genetic disorders.

#### Market Segmentation by Disease Type
The global PKD market is segmented into two primary types: Autosomal Dominant (ADPKD) and Autosomal Recessive (ARPKD). ADPKD is the most common form, accounting for about 90% of PKD cases. ARPKD, on the other hand, is a rare form that primarily affects infants and young children.

#### Geographic Scope
The global PKD market is expected to grow in all major regions, with North America and Europe being the key regions. According to the insights from [Insights10](https://insights10.com/), the North American market is expected to grow at a CAGR of 5.2% over the forecast period, driven by the increasing prevalence of the disease and the rising awareness of PKD. The European market is expected to grow at a CAGR of 4.0%, driven by the increasing incidence of PKD and the availability of advanced medical treatments.

#### Conclusion
The global PKD market is expected to experience significant growth over the forecast period, driven by advancements in medical treatments, increased awareness, and the rising prevalence of the disease. The market is segmented into two primary types: Autosomal Dominant (ADPKD) and Autosomal Recessive (ARPKD). The North American and European markets are expected to be the key drivers of growth, with North America growing at a faster rate.

gts:
Japan is a country whose origins are deeply rooted in religious beliefs. Because of this, there are numerous temples and shrines to visit throughout each prefecture. Each of them have their own unique history and have created festivals to celebrate them. Here is a list of the festivals you must see and experience if you ever find yourself abroad in Nara Prefecture, Japan

Omizutori

Credit: Japan-guide.com

Omizutori, also known as the Fire Festival, is the oldest festival in Japan. Located at Todaiji Temple in Nara Prefecture, this festival has been running yearly for the past 1,250+ years. It‚Äôs held anywhere from March 1st to 14th to cleanse the people of their sins and to celebrate spring of the new year.

2. Wakakusa Yamayaki

Credit: ohmatsuri.com

It is believed that this festival started through a land dispute between Nara‚Äôs great temples, and that they burned the mountainside for peace. While the history of it is disputed, it doesn‚Äôt take away from the beauty of it all. Held on the 4th Saturday of each January, the Yamayaki festival includes several celebrations, including; the throwing competition of giant rice crackers, a breathtaking fireworks show and the burning of the side of Wakakusayama mountain.

3. Setsubun Mantoro

This astonishing festival held at Kasuga Taisha Shrine, also known as the festival of wishes, is held every February 3rd. During this festival, more than 3,000 stone and brass lanterns are lit to celebrate the transition of winter to spring. It is believed that if you have a dream or a wish that you eagerly want to come true, the shrine will help make it come true.

ANIFTY Inc. (Tokyo, Japan), the operator of ANIFTY, the first NFT marketplace for anime art, released version 2 on October 31, 2021. We are also pleased to announce that the total number of certified artists has exceeded 300.

The ANIFTY Marketplace, which specializes in anime art, was released globally on July 29, 2021 and handles NFT works by ‚Äúcertified artists‚Äù selected through a screening process from Japan and overseas.

Newly added features in Version 2 (V2)

In ANIFTY Marketplace V2, you will be able to sell your artworks immediately without paying Ethereum transaction fees (gas fee). ANIFTY is the first NFT marketplace in Japan to implement this technology on Layer 1 (Ethereum Mainnet). In addition, it will be possible to change the price and quantity of items even after they are listed (in such cases, the seller will have to pay for the gas).

ANIFTY Certified Artists

After the launch of the marketplace, ANIFTY welcomed a number of new certified artists. There are currently over 300 registered artists, including Tantanmen and Onigiriman, who are rapidly gaining popularity in the NFT community both in Japan and overseas, Haruki Minamura, who designed the Hololive Vtuber ‚ÄúNatsuiro Matsuri‚Äù ,and TAPIOCA, who illustrated the card game ‚ÄúBattle Spirits‚Äù.

We are looking for certified artists!

ANIFTY is looking for certified artists. If you are interested, please apply from the form below.

https://forms.gle/Ekv8jPANW4uzAtSK6

Number of Exhibits Surpasses 500

One month after the launch of Marketplace V2, the number of works on display at ANIFTY Marketplace has exceeded 500.

Auction function to be released in early 2022

**Oilfield Chemicals Market: Growth and Key Applications**

The oilfield chemicals market is projected to grow at a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 4.21% from 2019 to 2026, reaching a market value of USD 158.4 million by 2026. This growth is driven by increasing demand for efficient and environmentally friendly solutions in the energy sector.

Key applications of oilfield chemicals include:

1. **Well Completion and Workover Fluids:** These fluids are used to complete and workover oil and gas wells, ensuring efficient production and minimizing environmental impact.
2. **Fracturing Fluids:** Fracturing fluids are used to create fractures in oil and gas reservoirs, enhancing permeability and increasing production.
3. **Surface Treatment Chemicals:** These chemicals are used to treat surface equipment and pipelines, preventing corrosion and ensuring safe and efficient operations.

The market is expected to be segmented by type, application, and region. The type segments include inorganic, organic, and specialty chemicals. The application segments include well completion and workover fluids, fracturing fluids, and surface treatment chemicals. Global oilfield chemicals market is expected to grow at a CAGR of 4.21% during the forecast period of 2019‚Äì2026 and attain a value of USD 158.4 million by 2026.

Get more information on this report: Request Sample Pages

Oilfield chemicals are components available in liquid forms, widely used in oil & gas drilling projects for amendments in oil & gas exploration field operations. Drilling and production facilities mainly utilizes these chemicals to improve productivity and efficiency of the process & petroleum refining as well as to attain optimum performance with effective oil recovery. Oilfield chemicals promotes the maintenance of smooth operating oilfield, resulting in reduction of expenses over setbacks and stoppage faced during drilling processes. Additionally, they obstruct the formation of the metal scales and diminish the water level into the oil well during exploration & drilling, which positively affects in increasing demand and applications of oilfield chemicals.

The global oilfield chemicals market is growing exponentially and predicted to experience rapid growth during the forecast period 2019‚Äì2026. The factors majorly driving the growth of oilfield chemicals at global scale include growing exploration and drilling practices for natural resources such as oil and gas, rise in crude oil production, and need to reduce the gap between supply and demand chain. According to OECD, the crude oil production across the world is 3.97 million during the financial year 2017.

Furthermore, increasing population has amplified the energy requirements and to cope with energy demands more oil & gas E&P activities have been under taken to suffice the residential as well as industrial energy demand. This aspect has been boosting the growth of oilfield chemicals market.

Additionally, shift in inclination towards exploring the unconventional hydrocarbon sources is likely to infiltrate the market growth. Various advantages such as corrosion resistance, demulsification & paraffin dispersants, and repair system for cementing failures offered by the product further increases the demand for the product and is expected to fuel the market growth over the projected period 2019‚Äì2026.

For more information on oilfield chemicals Market, please click here.

CircadiYin is a weight loss supplement designed to help people lose weight without the need for strict diets or rigorous exercise. By boosting metabolism and improving circadian rhythms, CircadiYin offers a natural and effective solution for those seeking to shed pounds.

#### Testimonial: Sarah's Journey

Sarah, a 35-year-old mother, was struggling with her weight for years. She had tried various diets and exercise routines, but nothing seemed to work. That is, until she discovered CircadiYin. Sarah was skeptical at first, but after just a few weeks of taking the supplement, she noticed a significant change in her energy levels and overall mood. CircadiYin is a vegan-friendly and chemical-free supplement. It contains natural ingredients that work synergistically to boost metabolism and improve circadian rhythms. Unlike other weight loss supplements that may contain harsh chemicals or toxins, CircadiYin is gentle on the body and safe for long-term use.

#### How CircadiYin Works

CircadiYin is designed to support healthy weight loss by enhancing metabolic function and regulating circadian rhythms. By improving the body's ability to burn fat and regulate hunger, CircadiYin helps users feel fuller for longer periods, reducing the urge to overeat. Additionally, the supplement supports healthy sleep patterns, which is crucial for overall weight management.

#### Conclusion

CircadiYin is a powerful tool for those seeking a natural and effective way to lose weight. With its focus on boosting metabolism and improving circadian rhythms, CircadiYin offers a unique approach to weight loss that is both safe and sustainable. Try CircadiYin today and experience the difference for yourself!

CircadiYin is a weight loss supplement that can help you burn fat from all the stubborn areas of your body in no time. It does this by restoring the circadian rhythm. The circadian rhythms are the internal clocks in our brain that work all day. Our mental, physical and behavioral changes follow this 24-hour cycle that regulates alertness and sleepiness by responding primarily to light and dark. This is why most living things sleep at night and are awake during the day

gts:
InPoker announces partnership with DareNFT, an NFT 2.0 protocol that brings innovation to the world of digital assets InPoker Nov 23, 2021¬∑2 min read

InPoker and DareNFT are pleased to announce they have entered into a strategic partnership to combine DareNFT‚Äôs innovative NFT ecosystem with InPoker ambitious e-sports vision.

DareNFT is an universal NFT 2.0 protocol for digital assets. DareNFT has developed a suite of products to address some of the challenges in the NFT landscape, including unrecognized benefits between NFTs, unrecognized relationships between NFT owners and hidden risks of NFT ownership. There are many content types out there and whereas the content types matter at application level, the licensing protocol layer is the same for all of them. Therefore, there is only one protocol needed to serve all.

The existing licencing processes of derivative content are mostly manual and time consuming. With an NFT 2.0 smart contract, these processes can be automated. Derivative content such as: song remixes, subtitled videos, edited images, learning contents, translated book often generates revenue from the rental and subscription business model. Creators can receive royalties from reproducer‚Äôs revenue via the NFT smart contract. This speeds up collaboration and sharing of benefits between the author and re-publisher, resulting in more income for both parties.

The advent of the NFT 2.0 protocol that DareNFT proposes can mark a new milestone for nonfungible tokens and the crypto market in general. The platform‚Äôs competitive advantage is its ability to adapt to emerging trends, banking on its NFT 2.0 protocol which is an essential element for building a thriving platform.

DareNFT will provide InPoker with the access to its ecosystem and the NFT marketplace where InPoker plans to list some of the Elite NFT membership cards. This long-term partnership marks a significant milestone in InPoker‚Äôs efforts to introduce the cutting edge technologies to online gaming.

Visit DareNFT: https://darenft.com/

Stay tuned for more exciting developments on https://www.inpoker.io

Join our official Telegram Channel here: https://t.me/influencerpoker
