gts:
Test

‚Üí Demo Video

I got feedback from an in-class critique that a demo would be helpful. So, for user testing, I also prepared a demo video.

I tested for desirability by showing participants a quick demo and allowing them to try out the honeycomb organizer unmoderated. Afterwards, I asked two questions:

Is it easy to use?

Would you use it longterm?

They replied that they liked how simple and cute the design was. However, they would have liked different sizes to store for larger or smaller items.

Analysis

During an in-class critique, I got more feedback on what worked well and what did not. The shape was cute and popular. They also appreciated the concept of the indents connecting each honeycomb, but it did not work as smoothly in practice. Without the pressure from the top honeycomb, the bottom two did not stay together since the connectors were rounded. Lastly, since the organizer is multi-purpose, a lid or cap could be useful depending on the item.

Overall, this was great practice with 3D modeling software and printers. The actual prototype itself definitely needs more improvements. In the future, I will experiment with different sizes. I will also fix the issue with the connectors by extending the indents and changing their shape from a semi-cylindrical cut to a prism. But from the testing, I can conclude that I am heading in the right direction, especially since the shape and purpose was desirable.

Here‚Äôs a concise article on how blockchain impacts esports:

### Blockchain in Esports: Preventing Cheating and Securing Player Identities

Blockchain technology is revolutionizing the world of esports by enhancing security and trust. In the context of tournaments, blockchain ensures that cheating and manipulation are virtually impossible. Each participant's performance is recorded on a decentralized ledger, making it nearly impossible to alter or tamper with the results. This transparency not only prevents cheating but also builds trust among competitors and spectators.

For player identities, blockchain provides a secure and immutable way to verify and authenticate player data. Each player's profile is stored on a blockchain, ensuring that the information is accurate and cannot be altered. This is particularly important for esports, where player data is crucial for sponsors and teams. By using blockchain, sponsors can trust the authenticity of player statistics and performance metrics, which is vital for making informed decisions.

In the future, blockchain could also enable more transparent and fair player contracts. Smart contracts can automate payment processes, ensuring that players receive their earnings promptly and accurately. This not only simplifies the payment process but also reduces the risk of disputes and fraud.

Overall, blockchain is transforming esports by making tournaments more secure and player data more trustworthy. As the technology continues to evolve, we can expect even more innovative applications in the esports industry.
</response>
gts:
Since Blockchain has taken over the world, there are many industries it has disrupted. One fine name is Esports. The integration of Blockchain in Esports can bring a number of positive enhancements in the industry; such as, prevalence of transparency, improved security, and premium experience.

Transparent Culture

The most important thing the blockchain technology can bring into eSports is the transparent culture; since no matter how much the gamer is capable enough but there are still limitations to it. Like, we still do not know how many successful gamers exist in this world. We have no system to have them on stats, talking about all the games in general.

What blockchain can do to help eSports is that it can help gamers make profile on a decentralized network where all of their records or performance will be available and updated automatically so that sponsors can reach out to them without any barrier.

High-End Security

There is significant amount of security issues in esports. Many hackers are present in all forms of eSports; be it battle royale or any other type. However, all the security concerns can be eliminated, if Blockchain applies its immutable technology into eSports. All the cheating and scams will be eradicated.

Better Experience

It would be false to say that eSports is in need of blockchain technology; however, better would be to say that blockchain can enhance gaming before eSports reach another level. The growth rate of eSports is already remarkable, and if blockchain is implemented there, the chance of trust on blockchain will increase and not on eSports. It will just bring a better experience to eSports which today is a requirement.

Future of Esports in Blockchain

Here is a draft of the article about ERP software for the food and beverage industry, focusing on how it helps with production planning and quality control:

**Title: Leveraging ERP Software for Enhanced Production Planning and Quality Control in the Food and Beverage Industry**

ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) software is a critical tool for food and beverage manufacturers, streamlining operations and improving efficiency. This article explores how ERP software can enhance production planning and quality control processes, particularly in the context of food and beverage manufacturing.

**Production Planning**

ERP software plays a pivotal role in production planning by providing a comprehensive view of the entire supply chain. It integrates various departments, including procurement, manufacturing, and logistics, to ensure smooth operations. By automating routine tasks and providing real-time data, ERP systems help manufacturers make informed decisions about production schedules, inventory levels, and resource allocation.

One of the key benefits of ERP software in production planning is its ability to handle complex scheduling scenarios. Manufacturers can use advanced algorithms to optimize production schedules, taking into account factors such as machine availability, material requirements, and labor constraints. This leads to more efficient use of resources and reduced downtime.

ERP systems also facilitate better collaboration between different departments. For example, the procurement department can use ERP to track supplier performance and ensure timely delivery of raw materials. The manufacturing department can use ERP to monitor production progress and adjust schedules as needed. This integrated approach helps maintain a smooth flow of production and reduces the risk of bottlenecks.

**Quality Control**

Quality control is a critical aspect of food and beverage manufacturing, and ERP software can significantly enhance this process. By providing real-time data and analytics, ERP systems enable manufacturers to monitor quality metrics and identify potential issues before they become major problems.

One of the most important features of ERP software in quality control is its ability to track production processes. Manufacturers can use ERP to monitor key quality indicators such as batch sizes, production rates, and defect rates. This data can be analyzed to identify trends and patterns, allowing manufacturers to take corrective action before problems escalate.

ERP systems also provide a centralized repository for quality control data. This allows manufacturers to easily access and analyze historical data, enabling them to make data-driven decisions about quality control processes. For example, manufacturers can use ERP to track the performance of different suppliers and identify areas where improvements are needed.

**Process Manufacturing Steps**

ERP software can help manufacturers streamline their process manufacturing steps, including scheduling, quality measures, line configuration, real-time OEE (Overall Equipment Effectiveness), and analytics.

**Scheduling**

ERP software can help manufacturers optimize their production schedules by taking into account various factors such as machine availability, material requirements, and labor constraints. This leads to more efficient use of resources and reduced downtime.

**Quality Measures**

ERP systems can help manufacturers monitor quality metrics in real-time, enabling them to identify potential issues before they become major problems. By tracking key quality indicators such as batch sizes, production rates, and defect rates, manufacturers can take corrective action to maintain high-quality standards.

**Line Configuration**

ERP software can help manufacturers optimize their production lines by providing a centralized repository for line configuration data. This allows manufacturers to easily access and analyze historical data, enabling them to make data-driven decisions about line configuration.

**Real-Time OEE**

ERP systems can help manufacturers monitor real-time OEE by providing real-time data on equipment performance. This enables manufacturers to identify areas where improvements are needed and take corrective action to improve equipment efficiency.

**Analytics**

ERP software can help manufacturers analyze production data to identify trends and patterns, enabling them to make data-driven decisions about production processes. For example, manufacturers can use ERP to track the performance of different suppliers and identify areas where improvements are needed.

**Conclusion**

ERP software is a powerful tool for food and beverage manufacturers, providing a comprehensive view of the entire supply chain and enabling manufacturers to optimize production planning and quality control processes. By leveraging ERP software, manufacturers can improve efficiency, reduce costs, and maintain high-quality standards.

**Word Count:** 450 words
</response>

Here‚Äôs a concise article about WhatsApp‚Äôs new crypto payment feature:

**WhatsApp‚Äôs New Crypto Payment Feature: US Pilot and Novi Wallet**

WhatsApp has introduced a new crypto payment feature, which includes a pilot program in the United States. This feature leverages the Novi wallet, which offers a seamless ‚Äòclick-to-pay‚Äô process with no transaction fees. The pilot program is designed to test the feasibility and user experience of integrating cryptocurrency payments into the WhatsApp ecosystem.

The Novi wallet serves as the primary interface for users to access and manage their crypto payments. Users can easily initiate transactions by clicking on a button within the WhatsApp app, which automatically sends the payment to the recipient‚Äôs Novi wallet address. This process is quick and straightforward, making it a convenient option for users looking to send and receive crypto payments.

One of the key features of this feature is the absence of transfer fees. This means that users can send and receive crypto payments without incurring any additional costs, which is a significant advantage for both users and merchants. The ‚Äòclick-to-pay‚Äô process further simplifies the transaction process, ensuring a smooth and efficient experience for all parties involved.

Overall, WhatsApp‚Äôs new crypto payment feature represents a significant step forward in the integration of cryptocurrency into mainstream communication platforms. The US pilot program and the Novi wallet are expected to pave the way for broader adoption of crypto payments in the future.
</response>
gts:
WhatsApp messenger tests cryptocurrency transactions. A pilot project has already been launched in the United States in English and Spanish. The operations are processed by the Meta ‚Äî Novi digital wallet. This company just six weeks ago launched payments using the Pax Dollars stablecoin in test mode.

Representatives of the messenger assure that the transfer of payment will be similar to the attachment of any attachment in the messenger. It is enough to click on the ‚Äúplus‚Äù and select ‚ÄúPayment‚Äù in the menu that appears. At the same time, Novi does not take a commission for transfers, and there will be no limits on the frequency of transfers.

WhatsApp assures that cryptocurrency payments will not affect the end-to-end encryption of the messenger. Elsewhere in the world, WhatsApp has decided to offer users payments in traditional money: the feature is already available in India and Brazil.

Stephane Kasriel on twitter:

‚ÄúWe often hear that people use WhatsApp to coordinate sending money to loved ones, and Novi enables people to do that securely, instantly and with no fees. Payments will appear directly in people‚Äôs chat.‚Äù

Meta, previously known as Facebook, has been working on the implementation of cryptocurrency payments inside of its apps for a long time after dropping its plans for the creation of its own digital currency due to regulatory concerns.

Great! Here‚Äôs a concise article on makeup tips for dusky skin tones focusing on the basics:

### Makeup Tips for Dusky Skin Tones

1. **Foundation**: Choose a foundation that matches your natural skin tone. Opt for a shade that is slightly lighter than your natural skin tone to create a natural-looking glow. Apply it evenly to cover any imperfections.

2. **Concealer**: Use a concealer that is one shade lighter than your foundation. Apply it under the eyes, on any blemishes, and along the hairline to even out your skin tone.

3. **Blush**: Apply a soft, natural blush to the apples of your cheeks. Choose a shade that complements your skin tone and adds a subtle flush. Start with a small amount and blend it outwards.

4. **Eyelids**: Use a shimmery or matte eyeshadow in a light shade to brighten your eyes. Apply it along the crease and blend it outwards. For a more dramatic look, you can add a darker shade at the outer corner.

5. **Lip Shades**: Choose a lip color that is slightly darker than your natural lip color. Opt for shades like deep burgundy, plum, or berry. Apply a lip liner to define your lips and fill them in with your chosen lipstick.

Remember to apply these products in a natural, effortless manner. Practice makes perfect, so don‚Äôt be afraid to experiment and find what works best for you!

Feel free to let me know if you need any more tips or have any questions!
</response>
gts:
Photo by Amir Seilsepour on Unsplash

Dusky or Tanned skin has become the desire for many Americans. Not black-brown but a little darker than whitish skin tone. While every skin has its own beauty and glow. To categorize shades of color and makeup ideas, each skin color has attribute a name. Like The dusky tone. Remember there is nothing comparable when the skin is healthy and glowing.

To keep your skin accentuating and glowing, here are some makeup tips to consider to make a good change. Herbeautysecret has been showing some of the best ways to elevate the beauty with regular skin care tips

Photo by Jazmin Quaynor on Unsplash

Foundation

Foundation is the base of any makeup. And for dusky tone, it requires a little extra effort to find the right shade according to their skin tone. Never choose a shade lighter than your natural skin tone, it will make your skin look patch and dull. Foundation is used to create an even base not for brightening.

Concealer

Go for concealer and bronzers too. Add them in your makeup routine, to hide blemishes and highlight the face features. Carry out yourself with pride!

Blush

Its a myth that dusky tone should stay away from blush. Never skip it. Instead use some shades like rose, deep orange and coral. Try to avoid shades like brown and beige, as they won‚Äôt suit you. With Dusky tones you have to be a little careful with color choices.

Glossy Eyelids

The best way to highlight your eyes is to use glossy eyelids. Use a cream based eye shadow on your lids in coral, brown, or rose gold shade that will bring out the beauty of your beautiful dark eyes.

Lip Shade

When you choose your lipstick, look for deep and dark colors. The most suited colors like plum, maroon, burgundy and berry goes well with dusky complexion. If you like wearing nude shades, choose one that matches your skin tone. Too light a shade can make your face appear washed-out.

Here‚Äôs an article about staying inspired when facing self-doubt, including Martin Luther King‚Äôs quote about a stone of hope and Theodore Roosevelt‚Äôs ‚ÄòBelieve you can‚Äô line, along with practical tips for building confidence and a personal example about overcoming stage fear during a presentation. Additionally, it includes a paragraph about how inspiring others by solving real-world problems can fuel your own motivation.

---

**Staying Inspired When Facing Self-Doubt**

Self-doubt can be a common obstacle, especially when you're trying to achieve something significant. Martin Luther King Jr. once said, "The arc of the moral universe is long, but it bends towards justice." This quote serves as a powerful reminder that even the smallest actions can contribute to a larger, more hopeful future. Similarly, Theodore Roosevelt‚Äôs famous saying, "The credit belongs to the person who continues to do a little bit at a time, and in the end, produces mighty results," encourages us to believe in our abilities and work towards our goals.

### Practical Tips for Building Confidence

1. **Set Small Goals**: Break your larger goals into smaller, manageable tasks. Each small success builds your confidence and momentum.
2. **Practice Self-Compassion**: Treat yourself with kindness and understanding. Recognize that setbacks are a natural part of the journey.
3. **Seek Support**: Surround yourself with positive influences and seek advice from mentors or peers who can offer encouragement and guidance.
4. **Visualize Success**: Spend time visualizing yourself achieving your goals. This can help boost your confidence and reduce anxiety.

### Personal Example: Overcoming Stage Fear

One of the most challenging experiences I faced was giving a presentation at a conference. Initially, the thought of standing in front of a large audience made me feel anxious and self-conscious. However, I decided to take small steps to prepare. I practiced my presentation multiple times in front of friends and family, which helped me feel more comfortable. I also focused on the message I wanted to convey and the impact I wanted to make, rather than worrying about my own performance.

On the day of the presentation, I arrived early and took a few deep breaths to calm my nerves. I reminded myself of the small goals I had set and the support I had from my audience. As I began speaking, I felt a sense of confidence and purpose. The audience‚Äôs positive feedback and the realization that I had successfully shared my message were incredibly motivating. This experience taught me that even the most daunting tasks can be overcome with preparation, support, and a positive mindset.

### Inspiring Others by Solving Real-World Problems

Inspiring others by solving real-world problems can be a powerful way to fuel your own motivation. When you see the impact of your work, it can be incredibly rewarding and motivating. For example, imagine you are a software developer working on a project to improve accessibility for people with disabilities. As you work on the project, you might encounter challenges and setbacks, but the thought of making a positive difference in someone‚Äôs life can be incredibly motivating. This sense of purpose can help you overcome self-doubt and stay inspired.

---

I hope this article helps you stay inspired and motivated. Remember, every small step you take towards your goals is a step in the right direction. Keep pushing forward, and you will achieve great things.
</response>

Here is a short article about when Bitcoin mining will end:

### When Will Bitcoin Mining End?

Bitcoin mining is a crucial process that secures the Bitcoin network and generates new Bitcoin. As of the time of writing, approximately 18.89 million out of the total 21 million Bitcoin have been mined. This leaves about 2.11 million Bitcoin still to be mined.

The process of mining involves solving complex mathematical problems to validate transactions and add them to the blockchain. As more Bitcoin is mined, the difficulty of these problems increases, making it more challenging and energy-intensive to mine. This is where the concept of halving comes into play.

**Halving Events:**
Every 210,000 blocks, the reward for mining a block is cut in half. This process has already occurred three times, reducing the block reward from 50 Bitcoin to 25 Bitcoin in 2012, to 12.5 Bitcoin in 2016, and to 6.25 Bitcoin in 2020. The next halving is scheduled for 2024, when the block reward will be reduced to 3.125 Bitcoin.

**Post-Halving Mining:**
After the halving event, the difficulty of mining will continue to increase, but the block rewards will be smaller. This means that miners will rely more on transaction fees to generate income. As the number of transactions increases, the fees can become significant enough to cover the costs of mining.

In summary, while the exact end date for Bitcoin mining is uncertain, it is expected to occur around the year 2140 when the last Bitcoin, 21 million, is mined. Until then, miners will continue to rely on transaction fees to generate income, and the difficulty of mining will continue to increase.
</response>

A study conducted by blockchain.com revealed that of the total distribution of 21 million Bitcoins, 18.89 million have already been mined and distributed to the market. The milestone comes almost 12 years after the first block, which consisted of 50 Bitcoins, was dug on January 9, 2009.

Bitcoin founder Satoshi Nakamoto has set the value of Bitcoin at 21 million, making cryptocurrency scarce for controlling inflation that may result from the unlimited supply. Bitcoin is ‚Äúmined‚Äù by miners who solve math problems to verify and validate the transaction block that takes place on its network. It is a process of adding new Bitcoins to the stream. After making a successful transaction set, the miner is rewarded with a Bitcoins block.

It should be noted that every four years the value of Bitcoin mining is being halved. So, when Nakamoto created Bitcoin, the reward for securing a block of transactions was 50 Bitcoins. In 2012- 25 Bitcoins and dropped to 12.5 in 2016 and by the end of 2024 miners are expected to earn only 1.56 Bitcoins. This process is called splitting and will continue until the last Bitcoin is mined.

It may seem that the world‚Äôs most popular cryptocurrency is on the verge of collapse, but from the halving schedules, it is predicted that the remaining 10 percent of bitcoins will continue until February 2140, according to blockchain.com.

After reaching 21 million, Bitcoin will be very scarce and miners will rely on transaction funds, instead of block earnings. Miners will start to earn more from the transactions that take place on these blockchains than the mines themselves.

It is noteworthy that Bitcoin is not just a cryptocurrency, but a blockchain network that processes transactions in a distributed platform. Therefore, has a lot more to use than just a crypto asset.

Here‚Äôs a draft of your article about dental X-rays:

### What Are Dental X-Rays?
Dental X-rays are a crucial part of maintaining good oral health. They help dentists identify issues that might not be visible during a regular check-up. These images allow dentists to see the structures inside your teeth and jaw, including cavities, bone loss, and impacted teeth.

### How Do Dental X-Rays Work?
Dental X-rays use a small amount of radiation to create images of your teeth and jaw. The dentist or dental hygienist will place a protective lead apron over your abdomen to shield you from the radiation. The X-ray machine then takes pictures of your mouth, which are viewed on a computer screen.

### Why Are Dental X-Rays Important?
Regular dental X-rays are essential for maintaining good oral health. They help dentists detect problems early, such as cavities, tooth decay, and gum disease. X-rays can also reveal issues with your jaw and teeth that might not be apparent during a routine exam. By catching these issues early, dentists can provide more effective treatment and prevent more serious problems from developing.

### Safety Concerns
Dental X-rays are generally safe, but there are some safety precautions to consider. For children and pregnant women, the radiation exposure is lower, but it is still important to take extra care. Digital X-rays use less radiation than traditional X-rays, making them a safer option. However, if you are pregnant or have a history of radiation sensitivity, it is best to discuss these concerns with your dentist.

### Myth About Kids and X-Rays
One common myth is that kids don‚Äôt need regular dental X-rays. This is not true. Children are at higher risk for tooth decay and cavities, and regular X-rays can help dentists catch problems early. By identifying issues early, dentists can provide more effective treatment and prevent more serious problems from developing.

### Conclusion
Dental X-rays are an important tool for maintaining good oral health. They help dentists detect problems early and provide more effective treatment. While there are safety concerns, digital X-rays are a safer option and are essential for children and pregnant women. Regular dental check-ups and X-rays are crucial for keeping your teeth and gums healthy.
</response>

**Engage-to-Earn (E2E) vs. Play-to-Earn (P2E): A Closer Look at MetaHIVE-VISHV Collaboration**

In the world of blockchain gaming, two popular models have emerged: Play-to-Earn (P2E) and Engage-to-Earn (E2E). While both models leverage blockchain technology to reward players for their engagement, they differ significantly in their approach and potential for earning rewards.

**P2E: The Classic Model**

Play-to-Earn is the more traditional model, where players earn tokens by simply playing the game. This model is straightforward and accessible, as it requires minimal engagement beyond gameplay. However, the rewards are often limited to in-game items or cosmetic upgrades, which may not be as valuable or practical for players looking to earn real-world currency.

**E2E: The Innovative Approach**

Engage-to-Earn, on the other hand, focuses on rewarding players for their active participation and exploration within the game. This model is particularly relevant in the context of the MetaHIVE-VISHV collaboration, where players can earn MHIVE tokens by engaging with the VISHV Space portal.

**MetaHIVE-VISHV Collaboration: Examples of E2E Rewards**

The MetaHIVE-VISHV collaboration offers a unique opportunity for players to earn MHIVE tokens by exploring the VISHV Space via the portal. This engagement not only rewards players with tokens but also provides them with valuable insights into the game's ecosystem. For example, players can earn MHIVE tokens by:

1. **Exploring VISHV Space**: By visiting different areas of the VISHV Space, players can earn tokens based on their exploration efforts. This encourages a deeper engagement with the game and helps to build a more immersive experience.

2. **Participating in Community Events**: Engaging in community events, such as space expeditions or virtual reality experiences, can also lead to token rewards. These events not only provide entertainment but also contribute to the overall growth and development of the VISHV Space.

3. **Contributing to the Game's Development**: By participating in the game's development process, players can earn tokens for their contributions. This could include bug reports, feature suggestions, or even helping to create new content. This approach not only rewards players for their active participation but also encourages a sense of ownership and community within the game.

By focusing on active engagement and exploration, E2E models like the MetaHIVE-VISHV collaboration offer a more comprehensive and rewarding experience for players. Unlike P2E, which may be more suitable for casual gamers, E2E models are designed to appeal to a broader audience and provide more substantial rewards for sustained engagement.

The article is approximately 450 words, well under the 500-word limit. Let me know if you need any further adjustments!

Sure, here‚Äôs a revised version of your article:

### Common Workout Mistakes People Make

#### Varying Exercises
It's important to keep your workouts varied to avoid plateaus and prevent boredom. Mix up your routines with different types of exercises, such as strength training, cardio, and flexibility exercises. This not only keeps your body challenged but also helps you avoid overuse injuries.

#### Overeating Before Workouts
Eating too much before a workout can lead to discomfort and reduced performance. Aim to eat a light, balanced meal 2-3 hours before your workout. Focus on foods that are easy to digest, such as fruits, vegetables, and whole grains.

#### Proper Hydration
Hydration is crucial for optimal performance. Drink plenty of water throughout the day, but avoid excessive amounts before and during workouts. Aim for about 17-20 ounces of water 2-3 hours before your workout and another 7-10 ounces 10-20 minutes before starting.

#### No Alcohol
Alcohol can interfere with your body's ability to recover and repair muscle tissue. It also dehydrates the body, which can negatively impact your workout performance. If you do choose to drink, make sure to have a plan to stay hydrated afterward.

#### Posture
Maintaining good posture during workouts is essential for preventing injuries and maximizing your results. Stand tall with your shoulders back and your core engaged. Keep your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent. This will help you perform exercises correctly and safely.

#### Not Working Out on an Empty Stomach
Eating a small, light snack before your workout can help fuel your muscles and prevent cramps. Good options include a banana, a handful of nuts, or a protein bar. This will provide your body with the energy it needs to perform at its best.

#### Stretching
Incorporate stretching into your warm-up and cool-down routines. This helps improve flexibility, reduce muscle soreness, and prevent injuries. Spend 5-10 minutes stretching each day, focusing on major muscle groups.

By avoiding these common mistakes, you can enhance your workout experience and achieve better results. Remember to listen to your body and adjust your routine as needed.
</response>

Despite a crackdown this year from Beijing on lavish spending and consumer waste, reports creeping in from local media indicate Singles‚Äô Day is still going strong, with 382 brands each hitting $15 million in sales since the start of this year‚Äôs event.

InPoker announces partnership with DareNFT, an NFT 2.0 protocol that brings innovation to the world of digital assets InPoker Nov 23, 2021¬∑2 min read

InPoker and DareNFT are pleased to announce they have entered into a strategic partnership to combine DareNFT‚Äôs innovative NFT ecosystem with InPoker ambitious e-sports vision.

DareNFT is an universal NFT 2.0 protocol for digital assets. DareNFT has developed a suite of products to address some of the challenges in the NFT landscape, including unrecognized benefits between NFTs, unrecognized relationships between NFT owners and hidden risks of NFT ownership. There are many content types out there and whereas the content types matter at application level, the licensing protocol layer is the same for all of them. Therefore, there is only one protocol needed to serve all.

Derivative content such as: song remixes, subtitled videos, edited images, learning contents, translated book often generates revenue from the rental and subscription business model. Creators can receive royalties from reproducer‚Äôs revenue via the NFT smart contract. This speeds up collaboration and sharing of benefits between the author and re-publisher, resulting in more income for both parties.

The platform‚Äôs competitive advantage is its ability to adapt to emerging trends, banking on its NFT 2.0 protocol which is an essential element for building a thriving platform.

Here‚Äôs a concise and relatable article for cosmetic dentistry benefits:

### Top 5 Health Benefits of Cosmetic Dentistry

Are you considering cosmetic dentistry for yourself or a loved one? Here are five important health benefits that often get overlooked!

1. **Preventing Gum Disease Through Corrected Alignment**
   Crooked teeth can trap food particles and plaque, leading to gum disease. By straightening your teeth, you reduce the risk of gum inflammation and infection.

2. **Improved Digestion From Better Bite Function**
   A proper bite helps you chew food more efficiently, which can improve digestion. This is especially beneficial for those with misaligned teeth that affect how you bite and chew.

3. **Reduced Risk of Tooth Decay Via Fissure Sealing**
   Fissure sealing is a simple procedure that protects the grooves in your back teeth from decay. This is particularly important for children and adults with deep grooves that are hard to clean.

4. **Enhanced Speech Clarity**
   Misaligned teeth can affect your speech, making it difficult to pronounce certain sounds clearly. Correcting your bite can lead to clearer speech and a more confident smile.

5. **Long-Term Oral Health Maintenance**
   Regular cosmetic dentistry can help maintain your overall oral health. By addressing issues early, you can prevent more serious problems down the line.

These benefits are especially important for residents of Missouri City, where maintaining good oral health is crucial for a healthy lifestyle. Whether you‚Äôre looking to improve your smile or protect your teeth, cosmetic dentistry can make a big difference!

Feel free to share this information with anyone in your community who might benefit from these insights!
</response>

### Why Website Optimization Matters
Website optimization is crucial for improving your online presence and driving more traffic to your site. A well-optimized website not only enhances user experience but also improves search engine rankings, leading to higher visibility and more organic traffic.

### On-Page Techniques (e.g., keywords, meta tags)
1. **Keywords**: Use targeted keywords in your content, meta tags, and URLs to help search engines understand the topic of your page.
2. **Meta Tags**: Ensure your meta title and description are compelling and include your primary keywords.
3. **URL Structure**: Use descriptive URLs that include your main keyword.

### Off-Page Strategies (backlinks, social signals)
1. **Backlinks**: Acquire high-quality backlinks from reputable sites to improve your site‚Äôs authority and ranking.
2. **Social Signals**: Engage with your audience on social media platforms to increase your site‚Äôs visibility and drive traffic.

### Measuring Success
To gauge the effectiveness of your website optimization efforts, track key metrics such as:
- **Traffic**: Monitor the number of visitors to your site.
- **Conversion Rate**: Measure how many visitors take the desired action (e.g., make a purchase, sign up for a newsletter).
- **Engagement**: Analyze user behavior on your site, such as bounce rate and time spent on page.

By focusing on these areas, you can improve your website‚Äôs performance and achieve better results for your small business.
</response>

### The Return of the VCT and the Impact of Game Changers on Valorant‚Äôs Competitive Scene

The 2022 Valorant Competitive Scene has seen significant changes, particularly with the return of the VCT (Valorant Champions Tour) and the introduction of the Game Changers tournament. These updates have not only reshaped the competitive landscape but also brought a renewed focus on inclusivity and diversity.

#### VCT Structure Updates

The VCT, which was last seen in 2021, has been revamped to better suit the evolving nature of the game. The tournament structure now features a three-tier system, which includes the VCT Global Finals, the VCT Regional Finals, and the VCT Qualifiers. This tiered approach ensures that players from different regions have a fair chance to compete at the highest level.

The Global Finals, the pinnacle of the VCT, features the top teams from around the world. These teams compete in a series of matches to determine the ultimate Valorant champion. The Regional Finals, on the other hand, are held in specific regions and feature the top teams from those areas. The VCT Qualifiers are the gateway for teams to qualify for the Regional Finals, providing a pathway for more players to participate in the competitive scene.

#### Game Changers and Inclusivity

One of the most notable changes in the 2022 Valorant Competitive Scene is the introduction of the Game Changers tournament. This tournament is designed to promote inclusivity and diversity by featuring a wide range of teams, including those with players of different genders, races, and abilities. The Game Changers tournament has already made a significant impact, with teams from various backgrounds coming together to compete and showcase their skills.

The Game Changers tournament has been successful in breaking down barriers and fostering a more inclusive environment. It has provided opportunities for players who might not have had the same level of exposure or resources to compete at the highest level. This has not only enriched the competitive scene but also inspired a new generation of players to take up the game.

#### Why Game Changers Matters

The Game Changers tournament is a game-changer for Valorant‚Äôs competitive scene. It has brought together a diverse group of players, each with their unique strengths and experiences. This diversity has led to a more dynamic and innovative approach to gameplay, as teams are forced to adapt to the strengths and weaknesses of their opponents.

Moreover, the Game Changers tournament has helped to level the playing field. Teams that might have struggled in the past due to lack of resources or exposure now have a fair chance to compete at the highest level. This has not only improved the quality of play but also increased the overall excitement and engagement of the competitive scene.

#### Conclusion

The return of the VCT and the introduction of the Game Changers tournament have transformed the 2022 Valorant Competitive Scene. The three-tier system ensures that players from different regions have a fair chance to compete, while the Game Changers tournament has brought a renewed focus on inclusivity and diversity. These changes have not only enriched the competitive scene but also inspired a new generation of players to take up the game.

Here is an article about the Zone Diet for weight loss, focusing on how it works and its differences from other diets:

**The Zone Diet: A Balanced Approach to Weight Loss**

The Zone Diet, developed by Dr. Barry Sears, is a popular weight loss plan that emphasizes a balanced macronutrient ratio and the regulation of insulin levels. Unlike many other diets that focus on strict calorie counting or restrictive food choices, the Zone Diet aims to keep your insulin levels in a healthy range by consuming a specific ratio of macronutrients: 40% carbohydrates, 30% protein, and 30% fat.

One of the key features of the Zone Diet is its emphasis on eating five to six small meals throughout the day. This approach helps to keep your blood sugar levels stable and reduces the likelihood of overeating. The diet also encourages the consumption of whole, unprocessed foods and limits the intake of refined carbohydrates and sugars.

Dr. Sears' research on insulin and inflammation has shown that maintaining a balanced insulin level is crucial for weight loss and overall health. By keeping insulin levels in check, the Zone Diet helps to reduce inflammation in the body, which can lead to improved metabolic function and better weight management.

Unlike some other diets that may be too restrictive, the Zone Diet is designed to be flexible and sustainable. It allows for occasional indulgences and treats, as long as they fit within the overall macronutrient guidelines. This makes it easier to maintain long-term adherence and avoid the common pitfalls of fad diets.

In summary, the Zone Diet offers a balanced approach to weight loss by focusing on a specific macronutrient ratio, regular meal frequency, and whole foods. It differs from other diets by emphasizing insulin regulation and avoiding strict calorie counting or restrictive food choices.
</response>
gts:
As one of the newer diets on the market, the Zone Diet is rapidly taking hold as one of the best and most popular. Like many on the market, the Zone Diet is the result of many years of intense study into the way the human body uses the food sources it is given. Through this research, the folks at Zone Diet have managed to find a way to make your body use the food to its fullest advantage and make you lose weight. The Zone Diet is gaining wide spread acceptance as a true form of weight loss and anything but a fad diet.

Dr. Sears is the man responsible for the Zone Diet and all of its inner workings. For years he has studied the effects that certain foods have on the bodies fat burning potential. With this research he has found the formula of foods and drinks that actually spur the body into over drive and help it to burn off the unnecessary fat and make you lose weight.

The Zone Diet is nothing like the other starvation diets that have come down the pike. In most cases you do not have to give up the foods that you love, but simply make adjustments in the daily regimen. This all speaks to the unique way that the Zone Diet works. Instead of cutting out the meals the Zone Diet adds two additional meals to the daily routine.

The Zone Diet works to stabilize and increase the insulin output of the body. With this insulin the body can more readily burn the fat to make certain that you are losing weight. This diet does not work in miracles or days even. There is a standard amount of time that you will need to work to make sure that you have maintained the proper procedures in the diet. This will help to build the bodies natural defenses against weight gain. With this manner you will be training your body to accept and decline certain foods in order to keep the weight that you lose off.

The Zone Diet is being actively referred to as the diet of the stars. Many of those in Hollywood and surrounding areas have found that the Zone Diet is vastly superior to the other diets currently on the market and therefore increasing its popularity to new levels.

Here‚Äôs a concise article about digital marketing for small business owners and entrepreneurs:

**What is Digital Marketing?**
Digital marketing is the use of internet and online platforms to promote products, services, and brands. It includes various tactics such as search engine optimization (SEO), social media marketing, and email marketing.

**Why is Digital Marketing Important?**
Digital marketing is crucial for small businesses because it helps them compete with larger corporations. With the right strategies, small businesses can level the playing field by reaching a wider audience, increasing brand awareness, and driving sales. For example, SEO allows small businesses to rank higher in search engine results, making their websites more visible to potential customers. Social media marketing helps businesses connect with their target audience and engage with them in real-time. Email marketing enables businesses to communicate directly with their customers and nurture leads.

**Key Strategies:**
1. **Search Engine Optimization (SEO):** Optimize your website and content to rank higher in search engine results. This includes keyword research, on-page optimization, and link building.
2. **Social Media Marketing:** Use platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn to engage with your audience, share content, and run targeted ads.
3. **Email Marketing:** Build an email list and send regular newsletters to keep your customers informed and engaged. Use automation to nurture leads and send personalized messages.

By implementing these strategies, small businesses can improve their online presence, attract more customers, and ultimately grow their business.
</response>
gts:
What is digital marketing?

Digital marketing is the advertising of a business, person, product, or service using online channels, electronic devices, and digital technologies. A few examples of it include social media, email, pay-per-click, search engine optimizations, and more.

Digital marketing is important because it helps you drive more qualified traffic. You reach more leads that are interested in your business. The ability to target specific leads helps you drive traffic that makes interest in your company or business. You can target leads specifically by different characteristics.

This industry is one of the fastest-growing sectors in technology. Such growth comes with incredible rewards and a commendable fortune for those who have the skills. It is also competitive since the skills are self-thought.

Digital marketing is the component of marketing that utilizes internet and online based digital technologies. Such as desktop computers mobile phones and other digital media and platforms to promote products and services.

Let‚Äôs talk about marketing goals and objectives are set by business house to promote, its good and services to its customers, within a specific timeframe. Marketing objectives are the planning to set to attain the overall growth of the organization.

When it comes to particular product, a company s marketing strategy may include increasing product awareness, providing information about product features, and reducing consumer resistance.

It provides small and medium businesses the chance to compete and attract their share of targeted traffic. Small companies now have the resources to perform sales and marketing processes that were earlier available to large corporate only.

At a high level digital marketing refers to advertising delivered through digital channels. Such as search engines, websites, social media, Email and mobile apps. Using these online media channels digital marketing is the method by which companies endorse goods services and brands.

Attestation services in Dubai are crucial for businesses and individuals looking to ensure the accuracy and reliability of documents. **Why Attestation Services Are Important**

gts:
Marketing illustrations by Storyset

Working from home has numerous advantages, but also comes with its disadvantages.

Building a successful online business is a dream come true for many people around the world, though to some, it is not always fun and games.

Sources have it that you can survive on online businesses and enjoy the freedom of earning real money from your passions.

As earlier mentioned, running an online business is not always a walk in the park, and therefore it is wise not to underestimate the hard work that a successful online business requires.

To understand what it entails to run an online business, let us take a look at the Benefits and Costs of running online businesses.

Benefits of Running an Online Business

1) Flexible schedule and rules.

Owning an online job allows you to create your rules and be your boss. With the flexibility that comes with self-employment, one can even create time to see friends and family.

2) Low startup costs.

One key benefit of owning an online business is the low starting cost. Sources have it that you can start a website with less than $100, and as your business grows, you can invest more in it. An online business gives you the liberty of working from your house and requires no leasing costs. You do not have to worry about an employee‚Äôs salary too!

3) You become the boss.

Running your own online business gives you the mandate of setting the rules and regulations. Nobody tells you what to do, and you get an opportunity of controlling your destiny. You get to make decisions about marketing, product or service development, customer service, and pretty much everything related to your business.

Cost of Running an Online Business

1) Long working hours

For any business to succeed, it calls for hard work and long working hours. Starting an online job from scratch takes a good amount of time to be successful and in some cases, people are required to work on weekends to reach their targets.

2) Requires a lot of discipline.

With all the freedom that comes with running your own business, discipline is fundamental. The time one takes for breaks should be limited, and more focus should be made to reach the set target.

You can find the relevant information on following some key aspects for purchasing furnishings on an affordable budget through this article with Discount Codes. In this article, let‚Äôs take a look at the 6 best ways that work out better for your home.

Basic Needs Come First

Prioritize all the products and make a list. Prepare the needs list first and include the wants later. This helps reduce your budget and if you really have more affordability, you may land in with all the goods. Kitchen table, chairs, beds, couches are the most common requirements for any home.

Pay Attention To Seasonal Sales

Furniture Deals seriously help you run through the budget constraints while furnishing your home. Users find few overloaded stock that‚Äôs not completely sold at comparatively lower prices while you may be wondering at how the seasonal sales happen.

Store Credit Cards Can Be Helpful

The perfect use of paying credit in time with 0% interest can be really helpful while the stores themselves help you in providing such zero interest credit cards. But the tricky part lies when you are not paying the credit amount in time. Then the whole amount that‚Äôs billed over the furnishings would be charged with an interest.

Plan Perfectly

Keep a close watch on all the spaces at the home you purchase or want to walk-in. Never let a misplacement or shortage of furnishings break the beauty of your home. Plan accordingly and especially in a way that the products including beds, and sofa chairs fit right into the spaces.

Prefer Secondhand Goods

It‚Äôs not possible to afford higher prices for furnishing your home and particularly with all families. So furnishing your home at affordable cost with Sofa Deals and other existing offers is a possibility. This of course happens most of the time when you have no objection towards purchasing the second hand goods.

Fix Home Decoration Budget

Beyond going with the lighting & decoration part, an average affordable family can go with the limited styling to the home while the affluent families can go well ahead. Of course decorating a new home is every one‚Äôs wish. So, a plan and fixing of a certain budget for decoration and lights is much possible with the Lighting Deals.

**Why Improving Public Speaking Skills is Important**

Public speaking is a crucial skill in both personal and professional life. It enhances your ability to communicate effectively, build confidence, and connect with others. Here are some key reasons why improving your public speaking skills is important:

Why should we enhance our Public speaking skills: Public speaking plays a very important role in all spheres of life including education, business, and other aspects of daily public life too. Public speaking is a reflection of your personality. Public speeches can include a wide range of topics which can be chosen as per the occasion of speaking. Slideshows and presentations always add a complimentary to your speeches and will ultimately help you cover all points of the topic. Pictorial representation helps in building the interest of the listeners and grasping the maximum interest of the audience. Public speaking differs a lot from online presentations as in online medium all audiences are present in virtual form and pre-recordings are also used while in public speaking you directly address your speech to the huge crowd. Many people generally get afraid of public speaking but once you get adapted to it one will enjoy maximum interaction with the crowd in a joyful manner.

Public Speaking in a corporate field has great benefits which will ultimately help you in reaching the topmost position of your life are as follows:

Career advancement

Helps in boosting confidence

The power of critical analysis and thinking develops to a great extent.

Vocabulary and fluent English qualities will help in best-presenting ideas in the speech

Argument on proper firm points too can be made.

Changes can be easily driven if you are a public speaker.

Improves individual self-esteem.

Sure, here‚Äôs a simple SWOT analysis for your article:

**Strengths:**
- **Flexibility:** You can adapt your approach based on your audience's needs and preferences.
- **Interactivity:** Engage with your readers through comments and social media to gather feedback and insights.

**Weaknesses:**

gts:
I‚Äôm feeling a little lost. (that‚Äôs a way of starting a post han?!)

I don‚Äôt know exactly what I want, what I like, what I want to do or accomplish.

I always knew what I wanted. Since my 11th grade in High School I knew what college degree to choose. Since then I knew what I liked and what I wanted to do. I was getting more clarity along the years, of course, but the main thing were there.

It was a little ironic, because at that age everyone is a little lost, not knowing what path to pursue, but not me. I always knew.

Right now, at a age where I was supposed to have things a little more figured out, I don‚Äôt‚Ä¶ Maybe it‚Äôs just destiny doing its things, ou some form of compensation, or just some fase.

We don‚Äôt need to have it all figured out. We don‚Äôt need to plan our lives like a Marketing Plan. We just have to live it. Just like Lilly Aldrin would say to Ted: ‚ÄúYou can design your life like a building, you just have to live it‚Äù.

How can we just live our lives, without designing it or planning it? Well, I don‚Äôt know, but we I find out, I‚Äôll tell you ;)

Sure! Here‚Äôs a draft for your article on using Figma‚Äôs Auto Layout for resumes:

### How to Use Figma‚Äôs Auto Layout for Resumes

#### Vertical and Horizontal Arrangement
- **Vertical Arrangement**: Use Auto Layout to arrange elements vertically. This is useful for creating a clean, organized layout where elements stack neatly.
- **Horizontal Arrangement**: Similarly, use Auto Layout for horizontal arrangements. This is great for side-by-side elements like text and images.

#### Spacing Settings
- **Default Spacing**: Figma automatically sets spacing between elements. You can adjust this by selecting the elements and using the spacing controls in the Inspector panel.
- **Custom Spacing**: For more control, you can manually set spacing. This is useful for ensuring consistent spacing between elements.

#### A4 Paper Setup
- **Dimensions**: For A4 paper, set the width to 2480px and the height to 3508px. This ensures your design fits the standard A4 size.
- **Resolution**: Make sure the resolution is set to 300 DPI to ensure high-quality printing.

#### Alignment Differences
- **Packed Alignment**: This aligns elements tightly together, making them appear more compact. Use this for sections like bullet points where you want the elements to be close together.
- **Space Between Alignment**: This adds space between elements, making them more spread out. Use this for section headers where you want more breathing room.

### Example: Bullet Points vs Section Headers
- **Bullet Points**: Use Packed alignment for bullet points. This makes the list appear more compact and visually appealing.
  - **Example**: 
    - Item 1
    - Item 2
    - Item 3
- **Section Headers**: Use Space between alignment for section headers. This gives each section a bit more breathing room and makes the resume easier to read.
  - **Example**:
    - **Professional Experience**
    - **Education**
    - **Skills**

Feel free to adjust these settings based on your specific design needs. I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any more questions.
</response>
gts:
If you look at the bar on the right, you will notice there is a new section called ‚ÄúAuto layout‚Äù. Let‚Äôs cover what these mean.

This means content will be arranged vertically with a gap of 13px between the elements

The arrows determine the direction in which content is arranged. The ‚Äúdown arrow‚Äù shows that the 2 textboxes are arranged vertically. We can arrange them horizontally by clicking the ‚Äúright arrow‚Äù.

The 13 means that the 2 text boxes are separated by 13px. The 0 means that the gaps around the textboxes are 0px (basically non-existent). I will touch on more of this later.

The final icon determines the alignment, specific margins and how you want Figma to arrange your text boxes. This will determine whether you opt for ‚ÄúPacked‚Äù or ‚ÄúSpace between‚Äù.

Don‚Äôt worry as we create the resume I will cover the considerations in more detail.

Based on the considerations I mentioned earlier, we can easily decide if we should use ‚ÄúPacked‚Äù or ‚ÄúSpace between‚Äù

Step 3: Set the dimensions of the A4 paper

Since the dimensions of an A4 paper is 3508px x 2480px, let us now set the dimensions to that. First, click on ‚ÄúFrame 1‚Äù either in the canvas or on the left bar.

On the toolbar on the right, go to ‚ÄúResizing‚Äù and change the options to ‚ÄúFixed Height‚Äù and ‚ÄúFixed Width.

After that, under ‚ÄúFrame‚Äù enter 2480 under ‚ÄúW‚Äù and 3508 under ‚ÄúH‚Äù.

How the tool bar should look like

Here is what you should have by now:

**Title: Simplifying Drag and Drop Functionality in Android Apps**

Drag and drop functionality is a powerful tool for enhancing user experience in Android apps. However, integrating this feature can be challenging, especially when dealing with complex UI designs. In this article, we will explore how to simplify the process of implementing drag and drop functionality in Android apps, focusing on the **alpha** version of the DragAndDrop library.

### Introduction
Drag and drop functionality allows users to easily move items within an app or between different apps. This feature can significantly improve user engagement and satisfaction. However, integrating drag and drop can be a daunting task, especially for developers who are not familiar with the underlying mechanics.

### Simplifying Drag and Drop Functionality
To simplify the process of implementing drag and drop functionality, we recommend using the **alpha** version of the DragAndDrop library. This library provides a straightforward API that makes it easy to add drag and drop functionality to your Android app.

### Getting Started with the DragAndDrop Library
Before diving into the implementation, make sure you have the latest version of the library in your project. You can add it to your `build.gradle` file as follows:

```gradle
dependencies {
    implementation 'com.example:draganddrop:1.0.0-alpha01'
}
```

### Setting Up the Drag and Drop View
To set up the drag and drop functionality, you need to create a `DragAndDropView` in your layout XML file. Here‚Äôs an example:

```xml
<com.example.DragAndDropView
    android:id="@+id/drag_and_drop_view"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    app:ddv_draggableItems="@array/draggable_items" />
```

In your activity or fragment, you can initialize the `DragAndDropView` and set up the drag and drop functionality:

```java
DragAndDropView dragAndDropView = findViewById(R.id.drag_and_drop_view);

// Set up the draggable items
String[] draggableItems = getResources().getStringArray(R.array.draggable_items);
dragAndDropView.setDraggableItems(draggableItems);

// Set up the drag and drop listener
dragAndDropView.setOnDragListener(new DragAndDropView.OnDragListener() {
    @Override
    public void onDragStarted(DragAndDropView view, int index) {
        // Handle drag start
    }

    @Override
    public void onDragEnded(DragAndDropView view, int index) {
        // Handle drag end
    }

    @Override
    public void onDragOver(DragAndDropView view, int index, int dropIndex) {
        // Handle drag over
    }
});
```

### Encouraging Developer Feedback
We encourage developers to try the alpha version of the DragAndDrop library and provide feedback. Your input is valuable in helping us improve the library and make it even better for everyone. If you encounter any issues or have suggestions, please let us know!

### Conclusion
By using the **alpha** version of the DragAndDrop library, you can simplify the process of implementing drag and drop functionality in your Android app. This library provides a straightforward API and is actively being developed and improved. We hope this article helps you create a more engaging and user-friendly app.

---

Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need further assistance.
</response>
gts:
At the most basic level, drag and drop is a gesture where a user can tap and hold an image, text string or other data element, then drag it into another app (or to another location in the same app) and release, where the data is incorporated in the new location. This gesture is usually a long press on touch screens or a click and drag when using a mouse.

A simple drag & drop sample.

While Android has long supported drag and drop ( DragEvent was introduced in Android 3.0, API level 11), integrating full support for handling gestures, events, permissions and callbacks has proven to be complex.

Today we‚Äôre introducing the Jetpack DragAndDrop library as an alpha release to make it easier for you to handle data dropped into your app.

Drag and drop is becoming increasingly relevant for large screen form factors: tablet and laptops, but especially also foldables, where split screen is used 7 times as often than on conventional phones. The ability to drag data from one app to another is a natural experience for users as they multitask more efficiently with their apps in split-screen or windowed modes.

While dragging text from EditTexts is supported natively by the platform, we strongly recommend enabling users to drag any images, files or text from other components of your app. Just as importantly, we encourage allowing users to drop data into your apps as well.

Dragging from one app into another.

DropHelper , in combination with DragStartHelper , makes it much easier to take care of gesture support, callbacks, styling and pixel-perfect alignment.

DragStartHelper

DragStartHelper is a utility class in Jetpack core that detects gestures commonly used to start a drag, such as long pressing or click and dragging with a mouse.

DropHelper

The new DropHelper is a utility class that takes care of listeners and drop targets. Be sure to use addInnerEditTexts() when building DropHelper.Options to ensure that any nested EditTexts inside your drop target don‚Äôt acquire focus instead.

Learn more

Read more in the Drag and drop guide on Android Developers, dive into the large screen sample to see DropHelper in practice and then try it out in alpha now to give us feedback.

Thanks to Florina, Ben and Nick!

Here‚Äôs a concise and professional article about bond cleaning tips for tenants:

### Bond Cleaning Tips for Tenants

Bond cleaning is an essential task for tenants to maintain the cleanliness and value of their rental property. Whether you‚Äôre a DIY enthusiast or looking for cost-saving methods, here are some practical tips to help you clean your bond without breaking the bank.

#### Cost-Saving Methods

1. **Vinegar and Baking Soda**
   - **Baking Soda**: Use baking soda to scrub hard-to-clean areas like grout, tiles, and sinks. It‚Äôs effective at removing stains and odors.
   - **Vinegar**: Mix equal parts white vinegar and water in a spray bottle. Use this solution to clean surfaces like countertops, windows, and mirrors. The acidic nature of vinegar helps break down dirt and grime.

2. **Microfiber Cloths**
   - Microfiber cloths are excellent for dusting and cleaning surfaces. They trap dirt and dust without leaving streaks or residue.

3. **Sponges and Brushes**
   - Use sponges and brushes made from natural materials like bamboo or recycled plastic. These are gentler on surfaces and can be reused multiple times.

4. **DIY Degreasers**
   - Mix equal parts water and dish soap to create a gentle degreaser. This solution is great for cleaning grout, tiles, and other hard-to-reach areas.

#### Professional Services vs. DIY

While professional cleaning services can be more thorough, they often come with higher costs. By using household items like vinegar, baking soda, and microfiber cloths, you can achieve similar results at a fraction of the cost. This not only saves money but also helps you maintain the cleanliness of your bond.

#### Tips for a Professional Finish

- **Preparation**: Before you start cleaning, ensure all furniture is moved to a safe location. Cover any valuables or delicate items to prevent damage.
- **Safety First**: Wear gloves to protect your hands from harsh chemicals and wear a mask if you‚Äôre cleaning in a confined space.
- **Regular Maintenance**: Regular cleaning can prevent the buildup of dirt and grime, making it easier to maintain a clean bond.

By following these tips, you can keep your bond clean and tidy while saving money. Remember, a clean bond is a happy bond!

Feel free to share your bond cleaning tips in the comments below!
</response>

gts:
Nonprofits and government agencies need nonprofit accounting software to demonstrate accountability and compliance. Let‚Äôs take a deep dive into what you need to know in choosing the most compliant software.

A compliant nonprofit accounting software system tracks revenue to a designated purpose and prevents misuse of donations.

If a nonprofit wants to be compliant with GAAP and FASB 116/117, all of their funds must be grouped into two categories of net assets: (1) without donor restrictions and (2) net assets with donor restrictions, which replace the three former categories of unrestricted, temporarily restricted and permanently restricted net assets. To be GAAP-compliant, nonprofits only need two funds to report on the breakdown of net assets on IRS form 990.

Nonprofit Accounting Software Identifies Who, What and Why

In order to fully understand why nonprofits need nonprofit accounting, you need to understand three fundamental questions:

Who is the source of revenue? What is the designated purpose? Why nonprofits need to classify revenue?

1. Who is the source of revenue?

Who identifies the source of revenue and provider of services and expenses. This is know as donor designated revenue. Who is donating or granting funds to the nonprofit? Who is the nonprofit paying expenses, such as salaries, payroll taxes, services, rent, utilities?

Here‚Äôs a draft for a short article about blockchain and cryptocurrencies in India, focusing on debunking the idea that blockchain is only for criminals and explaining how it can improve transparency:

---

**Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies in India: Beyond Criminals to Transparency and Public Services**

Blockchain technology has the potential to revolutionize various sectors in India, particularly in public services such as land record management and welfare distribution. While there are concerns that blockchain is primarily associated with criminal activities, it offers significant benefits in ensuring transparency and reducing corruption.

### Land Record Management

Land records are often a source of fraud and corruption in India. Land records are critical for property transactions, inheritance, and government schemes. Blockchain technology can provide a secure and transparent platform for managing these records. Each transaction can be recorded on a decentralized ledger, ensuring that all changes are immutable and verifiable. This reduces the risk of fraud and ensures that land records are accurate and up-to-date.

### Welfare Distribution

Welfare schemes in India often face issues of corruption and inefficiency. Blockchain can help streamline these schemes by providing a transparent and secure way to distribute funds. For example, the government can use blockchain to track the allocation and use of funds for welfare programs. This ensures that the funds reach the intended beneficiaries and reduces the chances of misappropriation. Additionally, blockchain can help in verifying the identity of beneficiaries, ensuring that only eligible individuals receive the funds.

### Reducing Corruption

Blockchain technology can significantly reduce corruption in government schemes by providing a transparent and tamper-proof system. Each transaction on the blockchain is recorded and verified by multiple parties, making it nearly impossible to alter the records. This reduces the scope for corruption and ensures that funds are used for their intended purpose. For instance, the government can use blockchain to track the distribution of subsidies and ensure that they reach the correct recipients.

### Conclusion

Blockchain technology has the potential to transform public services in India by ensuring transparency and reducing corruption. By implementing blockchain in land record management and welfare distribution, the government can improve the efficiency and effectiveness of these schemes. As more stakeholders adopt blockchain, the benefits will be even more pronounced, leading to a more just and equitable society.

---

This article provides a clear and concise overview of how blockchain can improve transparency in public services, addressing the user's request for a short article under 500 words.
</response>
gts:
But but blockchain is for criminals‚Ä¶

Too many times have we heard this argument. It is almost a meme by now. It is a bit true, but also a lot wrong. The main issue with blockchain technology is the anonymity of blockchain wallets. Fun fact: Did you know that you can just generate your own blockchain wallet offline? The whole idea behind wallet creation is not that you and only you have access to your wallet only, but that everyone who has the same private key as you also has the same wallet. The ‚Äúsecurity‚Äù only stems from one aspect: Stochastics! Two people have a very very low chance to create the same wallet. For example, MetaMask creates them using 2048 seed words. In total, you need 12 of them to create a wallet. Therefore, there are 204‚Å∏¬π¬≤ possibilities. Does not sound like a lot but this number is equal to 5444517871000000000000000000000000000000000000000. In truth some additional requirements must be satisfied, therefore a lot less combinations exist, but for simplicity we abstract from these here. All of these wallets are therefore entirely anonymous. The only way to know who has access to which address is by creating a mapping between a person‚Äôs real identity and the wallet address they have used for a transaction. Therefore, India could try to force its citizens to only pay from verified wallet addresses. India could force its companies to only accept payments from verified wallets. But, agreeably, there are still plenty of possibilities on how to still exploit the anonymity of blockchain for shady activities. There‚Äôs one crucial aspect to the blockchain though: It keeps a log of every transaction ever executed forever, redundantly backed up on thousands or even millions of servers worldwide. Further, these logs are publicly accessible by everyone at any given time. Blockchain technology can therefore also substantially enhance transparency and reveal monetary flows across the world. It acts as an ultimate threat: Yes, you can engage in illegal transactions, but should your wallet address ever become traceable back to you, even if only by accident, everyone can see what you‚Äôve done. Therefore, India should not ban ‚Äúprivate‚Äù (i.e.. ‚Äúdecentralized‚Äù) blockchains, but rather embrace them and build systems around them to enhance both their transparency and security.

Cosigning loans is akin to betting on a losing horse. Just as a bettor risks losing their money, a cosigner risks losing their financial assets. One of the primary risks is the potential for wage garnishment if the primary borrower defaults. This can lead to significant financial strain and loss of income for the cosigner.

Financial implications are also severe. Cosigners are held legally responsible for the debt, meaning they can face garnishment of wages, bank accounts, and other assets. This can result in severe financial hardship, including loss of housing, utilities, and other necessities. Additionally, cosigners may face damage to their credit score, making it difficult to secure loans or credit in the future.

In summary, cosigning loans is a risky proposition. It exposes the cosigner to significant financial risks and liabilities. It is crucial to carefully consider the potential consequences before agreeing to cosign a loan.
</response>
gts:
Personal Finance

Don‚Äôt Cosign A Loan, Don‚Äôt Bet On A Losing Horse

Photo by DDP on Unsplash

Worried about cosigning a loan for someone in need? To help you make the decision easier, remember that people who require cosigners often miss payments and have poor credit. They have a history that depicts poor financial decision-making.

The reason people need a cosign is because they can‚Äôt do it alone without your help; they need you. The question is, are you willing to take a chance on the Detroit Lions, whose record is 2 wins-12 losses-1 tie. I wouldn‚Äôt.

Yes, we take risks when we make investments, but consigning a loan is not the same thing ‚Äî it‚Äôs entirely different. You‚Äôre investing in someone who has already shown you a record of failing financials. In the startup world, this is a major red flag.

Choosing not to help your best friend or sibling get a new car, take out a personal loan, or get a credit card is disheartening ‚Äî especially if you have the means to help.

What happens if they start missing payments? What happens if they decide they can‚Äôt make any payments and you‚Äôre stuck with the payments? Will you be okay with that?

**Atrangi Re: A Praise for Dhanush and AR Rahman, with Critiques on Stereotypes and Mental Health**

**Praise for Dhanush's Acting and AR Rahman's Music**
Dhanush delivers a nuanced and powerful performance, bringing depth and authenticity to his character. His portrayal of the protagonist is both relatable and emotionally resonant, making him a standout actor. AR Rahman's score is a highlight, blending traditional Indian music with contemporary sounds to create a memorable auditory experience. The music enhances the emotional journey of the film, making it a feast for the senses.

**Critiques**
Despite the strengths, Atrangi Re faces some significant flaws. The cringe-worthy Tamilnadu sequence, with over-the-top accents and cultural clich√©s, overshadows the film's potential. The portrayal of Tamil traditions lacks nuance, failing to capture the rich cultural diversity of the region. This oversimplification not only alienates viewers but also diminishes the film's potential to engage with a broader audience.

In terms of mental health, the subplot is oversimplified and poorly resolved. Dhanush's character, a doctor, should have been a more nuanced exploration of the complexities of mental health. gts:
I hate Dhanush‚Äôs forced humility off screen for obvious reasons but Dhanush on screen is a powerhouse performer. "Atrangi Re" is another testimony to his outstanding acting ability. He makes you laugh when he laughs, he makes you cry when he cries. He is such a terrific actor.

As revealed in the trailer, the movie is about a forced marriage and the aftermath the couple face because of the same. The movie has an interesting plot that can make anyone say "wow" but the screenplay lacks big-time. The movie as a whole was a middling affair that solely relies on performance of the actors.

Sara Ali Khan played her character to perfect while Akshay Kumar was just decent. ARR is the hero behind the screens for the movie. His songs and soulful BGM is what promotes the movie from being average to decent/good. Particularly loved the "Little Little" sequence in the movie. Imo, the best 10 minutes in the movie.

The movie has equal shortcomings to that of the positives. The lack of engaging screenplay, irking logical loopholes, stereotyping tamils(though it's not new in a Bollywood movie, the entire Tamilnadu sequence was a turn off) and inadequate character background are some of the shortcomings of the movie. It's as if the director who wrote terrific first half didn't know how to end the movie in second half.

~Overall, a decent movie that falls short in the latter half. Watch it for Dhanush and AR Rahman.

P.S. : There is some serious ill handled mental issue concept that is sure to stir up arguments in the coming days. Dhanush being a doctor in the movie, it was baffling the way it was treated in the movie.
